0831180104000001--.name: Oh, you haven't completed your job advancement yet? Don't sweat it! There's still time! When you're ready for your job advancement, you should head to the $map:02000188$!

0831180104000002--.name: Many have come to the $map:02000188$ in the hopes of seeing the Empress. I'm sure there will be someone here qualified to help you advance to a new job. You should run over to the $map:02000188$ and ask around there.

0831180104000003--.name: Have you decided which job you would like to advance to? You might consider asking those at the $map:02000188$ with first-hand experience.

0831180104000004--.name: $MyPCName$, you completed your job advancement! Congratulations! I'll be rooting for you!

0831180104000005--.name:
Hey. Yeah, you.
Take this flier about $map:02000107$.

0831180104000007--.name:
You don't need to buy anything!
I'm just saying that maybe you should consider changing your style at <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000107$</font>!

0831180104000008--.name:
A place where you can change everything from top to bottom!
That place is <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000107$</font>!

0831180104000009--.name:
If you go there, there will be <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000462$</font>, a part-timer who's handing out fliers just like me.
<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000462$</font> will tell you how you can alter your style to become even trendier!
Now, head on over!

0831180104000010--.name:
Don't be afraid of change.
There's no need to be afraid.

0831180104000011--.name:
Welcome!
I'm handing out copies of <font color="#ffd200">The Guide to Enjoying $map:02000107$ 100 Times More</font>. Would you like one?

0831180104000013--.name:
It's just supposed to be a promotion of $map:02000107$!
Is this your first time at $map:02000107$?

0831180104000014--.name: Ask what kind of shops are at $map:02000107$.

0831180104000015--.name: At <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000107$</font>, you can go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52000008$</font>, where you can change your hairstyle and makeup, <font color="#ffd200">$map:52000010$</font>, where you can change face, and <font color="#ffd200">$map:52000009$</font>, where you can dye your items.

0831180104000016--.name:
In order to use the Beauty Salon's services, you will need <font color="#ffd200">Merits</font>.
The different pricing options are a little difficult to explain here.
For more detail, please go to the shop itself.

0831180104000017--.name:
Did that answer all of your basic questions about $map:02000107$?
If you're ever feeling a little down, please go enjoy $map:02000107$'s services!

0831180104000018--.name: Hey, can we talk for a second?

0831180104000020--.name:
I know this is a little random...but this is an emergency.
How does my hair look? I just got it done at the Beauty Salon...

0831180104000021--.name:
How is it? How does it look?
...No, no. No matter how many times I look at it, it just looks bad.
I need to redo it.

0831180104000022--.name:
Can you please go to $map:02000001$ to find my older brother $npc:11000331$ and tell him to bring money to $map:52000008$?
I already spent all the money he gave me to do my hair.

0831180104000023--.name:
Take the taxi instead of walking all the way there...
The taxi isn't that expensive...
The time wasted walking is a bigger waste...

0831180104000024--.name:
Didn't leave yet?
You do realize that the taxi will take you where you want to go that much more quickly?

0831180104000025--.name:
You were looking for me?
What do you need?

0831180104000027--.name:
What? Ugh... Why does she do this to me?
She said she'd behave if I let her tag along for the levee.
But even though the levee has been canceled, she still insists on spending all this money.

0831180104000028--.name:
If I keep giving her money, I'm going to be losing money faster than I can earn...
Ugh...

0831180104000029--.name:
Do you realize how popular cars are?
With all this people in the showroom, there's simply no time to rest!
I'm busier than I've ever been...but at least I'm getting tons of commission! Haha!
With all this money coming in, I was even able to purchase a diamond ring so that I can propose to the one I love!

0831180104000031--.name:
That's a secret!
I'm planning on surprising her... So no one gets to know!

0831180104000032--.name:
I left the box with the diamond ring with <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000011$</font> for safekeeping... I'm sure it's safe, right?
Actually...just to make sure...could you go check for me?

0831180104000034--.name:
Where else would be a banker be other than the bank! Hahaha!
<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000011$</font> is inside <font color="#ffd200">$map:2000034$</font>!
<font color="#ffd200">The building with a spinning Meso on top</font> is the <font color="#ffd200">bank</font>!
Please ask if <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000011$</font> has the ring safe and sound.

0831180104000035--.name: My jaw is sore from talking to all these people interested in cars. Whew.

0831180104000036--.name:
Ah, $npc:11000325$'s ring? Not to worry!
It's stored somewhere very safe.

0831180104000038--.name:
This is the Goldus Bank, where reliability and safety are our top priorities.
We store precious items for safekeeping.
You are also welcome anytime if you have anything that you want stored away.

0831180104000039--.name: Since there is a Goldus Bank employee in every village, <font color="#ffd200">a stored item can be retrieved anywhere!</font>

0831180104000040--.name:
I was also curious as to how big the earthquake was!
If you're also curious, take a look through <font color="#ffd200">the telescope next to me</font>!
This is no laughing matter!

0831180104000041--.name: Did you see? Did you see?

0831180104000044--.name:
It's no joke right? Isn't that scary?
Just imagining that earthquake makes me tremble in fear!

0831180104000045--.name:
You're not as brave as you look, eh?
You're not even looking directly down at it. Do you know how to look through a telescope?

0831180104000046--.name: Say that you are not afraid.

0831180104000047--.name:
All right, if you say so...
Anyway, if you ever get curious, feel free to come take a look anytime. You'll be quite surprised!

0831180104000048--.name:
The earthquake didn't just split the ground.
You can tell by looking behind me, but the ground is now elevated in certain areas.
Just happens that the place we stored the cooking ingredients for the levee was where the ground was most impacted...

0831180104000049--.name: Although some bundles fell down the cliff, there are still some that have fortunately remained on top of the elevated land.

0831180104000050--.name:
Could you climb up and bring <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000063$</font> back?
If you use the <font color="#ffd200">$skill:20000011$ skill</font>, you'll have a much easier time.

0831180104000051--.name:
If you fall from a high place, you may hurt yourself.
Be extra careful. It's dangerous.

0831180104000052--.name:
Thank you so much!
Thanks to you, we can at least send the cooking ingredients for the levee to $map:02000001$!

0831180104000053--.name:
Hey, $MyPCName$! Did you hear the rumors?
They say that there's going to be a special event at $map:02000123$?

0831180104000054--.name: Ask what kind of an event it's going to be.

0831180104000055--.name: To celebrate their alliance with $npc:11000185$, Goldus Construction is handing out their newly formed <font color="#ffd200">Maple Apartment Ticket</font>.

0831180104000056--.name: Ask if that apartment is any good.

0831180104000057--.name:
I'm not sure yet... You're going to have be there to know...
Free tickets are being given out... This is a can't-miss opportunity!

0831180104000058--.name: Ask where a ticket can be obtained.

0831180104000059--.name: <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000600$</font> at <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000123$</font> is handing out <font color="#ffd200">Maple Apartment Tickets</font> on a first-come, first-served basis. You should go if you're interested!

0831180104000060--.name:
I've also only heard rumors about this...
If you really want to find out some information, you should go see for yourself.

0831180104000061--.name:
Hello? I am <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000600$</font>, Ms. Kim's assistant.
Have you come to see the house?

0831180104000062--.name: Say that you want to receive the $item:30000145$.

0831180104000063--.name:
Ah, I see!
Well, I'll need to check and see if there are any tickets left.
As soon as the news broke that free tickets were being handed out, people came like moths to a flame!

0831180104000064--.name:
Oh! There happens to be exactly one ticket left!
Here! Take the $item:30000145$.
Use this ticket when you want to move into the Maple Apartments.
However, there are some <font color="#ffd200">conditions</font> you need to know about!

0831180104000066--.name:
<font color="#ffd200">Those who already own a house cannot use the Maple Apartments!</font>
This promotion was specifically started for those who have not yet been able to find a satisfactory home.

0831180104000067--.name: Ask how the Maple Apartments can be used.

0831180104000068--.name:
If you click on the <font color="#ffd200">house-shaped icon in front of the Maple Apartments</font>, a contract will come up.
Read the contract carefully and submit the coupon to move in!
Quite simple, right?

0831180104000069--.name:
And during this special event, <font color="#ffd200">supplies for designing your own special interiors</font> are being provided.
Please enjoy the various amenities at the Maple Apartments!

0831180104000070--.name: Ask where the Maple Apartments are.

0831180104000071--.name: Ah! The location of the <font color="#ffd200">Maple Apartments</font>is<font color="#ffd200"> written on the ticket</font> that I gave you!

0831180104000072--.name:
You must have put a lot of effort into your training.
I know that the monsters couldn't have been easy to fight, but now, you seem to look like a proper Knight!

0831180104000073--.name:
I will teach you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Knight</font>.
This is of the utmost importance, so be ready to listen.
Let me know when you are ready.

0831180104000074--.name:
Do you want to know how to become a stronger Knight?
The path to becoming even stronger is through <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>.
There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

0831180104000075--.name:
The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill.
You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find.
But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials.
Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.

0831180104000076--.name:
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill.
Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials!

0831180104000077--.name:
You must have put great effort into training.
Let's see... Such strong shoulders and fearless eyes! I can feel the confidence!
You now seem like a proper Berserker.

0831180104000078--.name:
I will teach you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Berserker</font>.
This is essential in becoming an even more powerful Berserker, so come talk to me when you are ready for the next step.

Let's see... It seems like you've been studying extremely hard.
You now carry with yourself the air of a proper Wizard.

0831180104000083--.name:
I will show you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Wizard</font>.
The advice I am going to impart onto you is of the highest importance, so come talk to me again once you have prepared yourself.
Remember, Wizards must be able to quickly comprehend new information, no matter how difficult or arcane the issues may be... You know that, right?

Heh, dying to know, eh?

I realize how laborious the training may have been.
However, it is important to pray upon the heavens during such trying times.
I can sense that through rigorous prayer and training, the spirit of a proper, devout Priest flows through you.

0831180104000088--.name:
I will pass on to you what is needed <font color="#ffd200">to become a stronger Priest</font>.
When you are ready to listen to the good word, please come talk to me again.

0831180104000089--.name:
There is no special secret to becoming a powerful Priest.
Remaining true to the fundamentals, remembering the basics... These are the most important tenants to keep.
Diligent prayer with a pure heart is a foundation you can rely on for the rest of eternity.

0831180104000090--.name:
There are different ways to get stronger... And one way is through <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>.

0831180104000093--.name:
Hunting all those monsters could not have been an easy task.
But I'm sure you are now proud to be a member of the Green Hood!
You even look like a proper Archer now!

0831180104000094--.name:
I will now show you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Archer</font>.
What I'm about to tell you is extremely important, so talk to me when you're ready.

0831180104000098--.name:
I can tell you've been training hard!
I can sense the essence of a true Heavy Gunner from you now!

0831180104000099--.name:
Well then, I'll show what it's going to take <font color="#ffd200">to become a stronger Heavy Gunner</font>.
You're going to want to remember this! Come talk to me again when you're ready to listen!

0831180104000100--.name:

0831180104000103--.name:
Hunting monsters isn't such a walk in the park, huh? How goes the training?
Hm... I'm starting to get the feeling that you're starting to look like a proper Thief.

0831180104000104--.name:
I will show you the way in <font color="#ffd200">becoming a stronger Thief</font>.
This will be vital in your development, so come back when you feel prepared.

0831180104000105--.name:

0831180104000108--.name:
...What's this?
I'm not used to someone talking to me first...
Ah, if my memory serves me correctly, I was the one who led you down the Assassin's path.
How does the path of darkness suit you?

0831180104000109--.name:
Your eyes...
They seem ready to tread an even darker path.
Very well. I shall show you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Assassin</font>.
What I'm about to tell you should not be taken lightly, so come back to me when you feel prepared.

0831180104000110--.name:
So, you want to know what is required to become even more powerful?
The path to true power lies in <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>.
There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials...

0831180104000113--.name:
Don't think because I'm being nice this one time means that I'm going to help you all the time!
All enter this world alone, and leave alone in the end...

0831180104000114--.name:
Achoo! Sniff. Ah, hey you.
Can you—ACHOO!—h-help me?

0831180104000115--.name:
I have a pollen allergy... Achoo!
The honey from these wildflowers is supposed to—achoo!—help with that.

0831180104000116--.name:
Sniff. I can't even get close to the flowers because of my allergies… Achoo!
Can you collect the $item:30000125$ from the <font color="#ffd200">wildflowers</font> for me? Sniff.

0831180104000117--.name:
There are wildflowers all over <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000008$</font>,
so there's no reason to go out of your way. Just pick some the ones...achoo!...near me.

0831180104000118--.name:
Achoo! You've already harvested them! Sniff.
Hopefully this pollen allergy will annoy me no longer...

0831180104000119--.name:
Mmm, what a refreshing scent. I can feel my breathing has improved, and it's stopped my sneezing!
Here, I've prepared a gift to show my thanks... Ah...ah...achoo!

0831180104000122--.name:
We need to teach the <font color="#ffd200">$npc:99000041$</font> a lesson!
Why? They're harassing people! Do we need another reason?
You'll help, right?

0831180104000123--.name: I wonder why the <font color="#ffd200">$npc:99000041$</font> have suddenly increased in number?

0831180104000124--.name:
Thanks.
I feel like this path has become safer thanks to you.

0831180104000125--.name:
Can I ask one more favor?
There are monsters on the forest trail that connects to here,
and $npc:11000410$ is dealing with them alone. 
Could you help?

0831180104000126--.name: I'll take care of things here, you should go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000010$</font> and help $npc:11000410$.

0831180104000127--.name:
$npc:11000409$ sent you to help me?
Thanks for coming! I was just thinking it'd be nice to have some help.

0831180104000128--.name:
This forest trail is the only way to get to $npc:11000407$.
He tells strange stories every once in a while...
But that's why everyone loves to visit him.

0831180104000129--.name:
The monsters have made it too dangerous to travel on this road.
$npc:11000409$ and I are trying to defeat the monsters and make this path safer.
It's a lot of work for just the two of us.
That's probably why $npc:11000409$ asked for your help.

0831180104000130--.name:
Well? Will you help me get rid of the <font color="#ffd200">$npc:99000042$</font> here?
I would be ever thankful for your assistance!

0831180104000131--.name:
It's not going to be easy dealing with the monsters.
Don't give up on me.

0831180104000132--.name:
You've already dealt with all of them? Amazing!
I'll take care of the rest. Head on over to the town.

0831180104000133--.name:
It's been a while...
I see that your skills have improved. You're turning into a serious Knight now.

0831180104000134--.name:
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you?
Don't forget to keep upgrading if you want to become a guard Knight for Tria and the Empress!
I'll let you in on another tip today...

0831180104000135--.name: Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

0831180104000136--.name:
For example, you'll need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>.

As long as you utilize these basic skills, you have a chance at becoming as great as I am... Heh...

0831180104000272--.name:
Badum! Badum-tss! Feel the rhythm, like I am.
My heart is beating along with the beat of the drums.
Hit every beat! Badum! Badum-tss!

0831180104000273--.name:
It's natural to express your emotions through your body.
Just let your body do its thing—and dance!

Then tap whichever <font color="#ffd200">action best expresses how you feel</font>!

0831180104000275--.name: That's right! Have you tried out the <font color="#ffd200">Dynamic Action</font> yet?

0831180104000276--.name: Say that you've tried a Dynamic Action.

0831180104000277--.name: Say that you haven't tried a Dynamic Action yet.

0831180104000278--.name:
Good job! Way to go, man! Let your body do the talking!
Whenever, wherever! Badum, badum-tss!

<font color="#ffd200">Purchase an Action Certificate </font>, then <font color="#ffd200">double-click</font> it to become a master of action!

0831180104000285--.name: Ask what he's so worried about, when the loan sharks will be looking for $npc:11000526$.

0831180104000293--.name: Ask if $npc:11000609$ could push the payment back.

0831180104000301--.name: Demand to know why he's changing his tune.

0831180104000312--.name: Tell him that $npc:11000610$ wrote off his debt.

0831180104000316--.name:
The little girl from $map:02000203$ was going around town causing a scene for awhile.
She was looking for "<font color="#ffd200">the person who left behind the Onyx</font>".

0831180104000317--.name:
I think she was trying to return a lost item to its owner, but the owner can't be found.
You can go see for yourself if you're curious.

0831180104000318--.name:
Who knows? It might be someone you know.
Might as well check it out.

0831180104000319--.name:
Ah… My legs hurt… 
I've been wandering around $map:02000076$ for so long, but no one will come forward...

0831180104000321--.name:
Someone lost this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font>. 
I'm looking for the owner... Say, do you know the owner of this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font>?

0831180104000323--.name: Say that you aren't the owner.

0831180104000324--.name: Say that you are the owner.

0831180104000325--.name:
You...don't know what a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> is?
All you need is a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> for $npc:11000508$ to boost your items!

0831180104000326--.name:
It's important to have powerful items when going on an adventure, right?
I'm getting ready here because I thought I should have at least one legendary weapon before I embark on an adventure.

0831180104000328--.name:
I'm trading my own items for other people's <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font>
so I can use the <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> to boost my own items!

0831180104000329--.name:
But then... A little while ago someone dumped a whole bunch of <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> and just took off. 
I debated with myself for some time, wondering if I should just keep it...
But I was raised with values, you see.

0831180104000330--.name:
But looking for the owner has been very difficult... Hey, do you want this stuff? 
I don't feel good about carrying it on me. You should take it!

0831180104000331--.name:
Go to $npc:11000508$, or let's do an exchange for something I'm carrying!
It's best to use up a windfall like this right away!

0831180104000332--.name:
Ah… Really? 
It's just not my style to keep things that aren't mine...
Why don't you take them off my hands?

0831180104000333--.name:
Don't be modest! I'm not trying to pass the buck...
It just feels like you're not bothered by this as much as I am!

0831180104000334--.name:
Go to $npc:11000508$, or let's do an exchange for something I'm carrying!
It's best to use up a windfall like this right away!

0831180104000335--.name:
Oh, yeah? 
Why would you dump all of this stuff in front of me? You shouldn't tempt people like that.

0831180104000336--.name:
Either way, you should consider yourself lucky. 
I was raised with values. That's why I was trying to find the owner.

0831180104000337--.name:
Hello, $MyPCName$!
Do you have a moment to talk about <font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font> and our professional <font color="#ffd200">maids</font>?

0831180104000339--.name:
<font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font> is a company that provides training and job opportunities to the youth of Maple World.
You could call us the best <font color="#ffd200">human resource development center</font> in Maple World.

0831180104000340--.name:
You know that Maple World is comprised of various islands, right?
Since Victoria Island is the central island of Maple World, a lot of the youth from the smaller islands often dream of moving to Victoria Island.

0831180104000341--.name:
Dream Naidz helps young people in pursuit of the <font color="#ffd200">Victoria Dream</font> through our various <font color="#ffd200">human resource development programs</font>.
Our program for developing service industry personnel is especially popular.
I myself completed service training at <font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font> to become the wonderful guide you see before you.

0831180104000342--.name:
Uh… I got excited and lost my train of thought. 
Anyway, you can talk to $npc:11000700$ to find out more.

0831180104000343--.name: You can find out more information about <font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font> if you speak to $npc:11000700$.

0831180104000344--.name:
Hello.
My name is $npcName:11000700$ and I'm here to promote <font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font>.
Can I help you with something?

0831180104000345--.name: Ask to learn more about the <font color="#ffd200">maids</font>.

0831180104000346--.name:
For times when you're exhausted by an abundance of housework, or when you don't want to sit alone in an empty house, just hire a <font color="#ffd200">maid</font>!
You'll have a chance to hire a <font color="#ffd200">maid</font> after you buy a house.

0831180104000347--.name:
And if you ever need a maid or anything maid-related after that, come find me.
I promise to do my best at finding the exact maid you need, $MyPCName$!

1124232104000348--.name: I'll go on ahead to $map:63000012$... I must meet with our cohorts who have gathered from across the land, to discuss our next steps. I'd like you to proceed to $map:63000011$ to rally $npc:11001232[gender:1]$ and $npc:11001233[gender:1]$, then join me.

1203154504000382--.name: $npc:11001232[gender:1]$ and $npc:11001233[gender:1]$! The most skilled of Arazaad's 16 disciples, and two individuals with whom you are quite well acquainted...

1203154504000383--.name: $MyPCName$, are you really playing games at a time like this? Or are your wounds more serious than I thought?

1203154504000384--.name: Pull yourself together! Arazaad, leader of the Runeblades, is dead—slain by $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$. We must discover why $npcName:11001231$ has committed this heinous crime, and what he is scheming now. There is no time to waste, head to $map:63000011$!

1124232104000349--.name: Pull yourself together! Arazaad, leader of the Runeblades, is dead—slain by $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$. We must discover why $npcName:11001231$ has committed this heinous crime, and what he is scheming now. There is no time to waste, head to $map:63000011$!

1124232104000350--.name: $MyPCName$! What's going on? When he heard you went after $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ alone, $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ set off looking for you. Did you happen to run into him?

1204024704000390--.name: I see... Well, I'm glad you survived. I still can't believe $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ would do such a thing... I cannot fathom his reasoning, nor forgive what he did to Arazaad. He has betrayed Terrun Calibre, and all of his Runeblade brethren!

1204024704000391--.name: Arazaad was not merely our teacher... He was like a father to me. $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ will pay for his sins!

1124232104000351--.name: Apologies... I know we should be focusing on the present, but this turn of events has been quite upsetting. Now, didn't you say that $npcName:21900095[gender:0]$ asked you to travel with me and $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ to $map:63000012$?

1204024704000393--.name: $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ is scouring the $map:52000015$ in search of $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ and his Jibrician minions. I'm uncertain when she will return, but perhaps in the mean time you can help me collect $itemPlural:30000439$ from the Whisperstones?

1124232104000352--.name: While we await $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$'s return, we should gather any $itemPlural:30000439$ from the Whisperstones so that they may be replenished.

1124232104000353--.name: Ah, thank you! I suspect there are those among our order have not yet heard our call to gather for an emergency meeting. If we don't replenish the Whisperstones' source of power, we won't be able to communicate with any of them.

1204024704000394--.name: The Jibricia, who specialize in rune magic, and we of the Pelgia, who specialize in our bladecraft, have long been at odds. But never has our philosophical conflict come to such physical violence.

1204024704000395--.name: All of this infighting asinine. In battle, a Runeblade's chances of victory depend equally on the power of their rune magic and their skill with a blade. Drawing imaginary lines in the sand makes no sense. Say, where's your usual blade? Did you lose it during your battle with $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?

1204024704000397--.name: I'm sorry... You must still be in shock after your ordeal... Here, take this. It's a bit battle-worn, but it will serve well enough, until you find something better.

1124232104000354--.name: Hmm... $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ should have returned by now. I worry something has happened. Will you go to the $map:52000015$ and search for her?

1124232104000355--.name: Hmm... $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ should have returned by now. I worry something has happened. Will you go to the $map:52000015$ and search for her?

1124232104000357--.name: They... nggh.. ran into the cave... You have to hurry...

1204024704000399--.name: Those damned Jibricia scum… I was ambushed by $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$'s followers. $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ chased after them all on his own...

1124232104000358--.name: Ugh... Those Jibricia scum... $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ chased after $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$'s followers all alone. Hurry... Help him.

1124232104000359--.name: $MyPCName$?! Are you lost? What are you doing here?

1204024704000401--.name: Then you should be escorting her to safety. Instead you're here, rushing headfirst into danger!

1124232104000360--.name: Well, there's no use scolding you. You're in the lions den now. I know you haven't fully recovered from your injuries, so stay on your toes.

1204024704000402--.name: I trust you remember <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900031$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900151$</font>, the most basic of Runeblade techniques?

1204024704000403--.name: Well then, show me the fruits of your training.

1124232104000361--.name: Well then, show me the fruits of your training.

1204024704000405--.name: According to $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$, they all ganged up on you in order to distract him for long enough to make their escape. I can't believe you managed to go up against half of the Eight Blades, the greatest of all Runeblades, and live to talk about it. If it weren't for $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ we'd both be goners.

1204024704000406--.name: Here... $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ said to give this to you when you woke up. It should help heal your wounds.

1124232104000363--.name: Can you walk? $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ is waiting to talk to you. Since you're the last person who saw $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ and all... well, there's a lot of questions that need to be answered.

1124232104000364--.name: Can you walk? $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ is waiting to talk to you. Since you're the last person who saw $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ and all... well, there's a lot of questions that need to be answered.

1124232104000365--.name: Ah, $MyPCName$. You doing okay? I was expecting a lot more gaping stab wounds considering what you've been through. They may be traitors, but the Eight Blades are the greatest Runeblades of our time. The fact you're here with your limbs intact is a credit to your training under $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$.

1204024704000407--.name: But enough smalltalk, I need answers. You personally witnessed $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$'s attack on Arazaad, yes?

1204024704000409--.name: Can you tell me any more about what $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ said and did during the encounter?

1204024704000411--.name: Hmm... A hypocrite...? Why would he have said that to Arazaad...?

1124232104000366--.name: $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ has set off with a group of others to hunt down the traitors who attacked you at the $map:52000015$. I'm sure you're chomping at the bit to chase after your teacher, but you can forget it. At your current skill level, you'd only slow him down.

1204024704000412--.name: Until $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ returns, you're to guard the fortress alongside $npcName:11001234[gender:0]$ and the others. And before you get any funny ideas, these aren't orders from me, they're a request from $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$. You can go now.

1124232104000367--.name: Until $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ returns, you're to guard the fortress alongside $npcName:11001234[gender:0]$ and the others. And before you get any ideas, these aren't orders from me, they're a request from $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$.

1124232104000368--.name: Huh? What was that? You heard it too, right?

1124232104000369--.name: I KNOW I heard a crashing sound coming from the direction of the $map:52000016$. But... that's a sacred place. We're forbidden from entering without express permission. What should I do...?

1204024704000417--.name: Right... First, we should let $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ know what's going on. I'll go fill him in, you go on ahead and investigate the disturbance. What, are you scared? If you want, you can wait here 'til I get back...

1204024704000418--.name: No... loud crashing noises don't just happen on their own. We should check it out. I'll go fill $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ in on the situation. You go ahead investigate the $map:52000016$. What, are you scared? If you want, you can wait here 'til I get back...

1124232104000370--.name: What are you waiting for? Go investigate the noise that came from the $map:52000016$. You're not afraid, are you?

1204024704000419--.name: He told me to join your search party.

1204024704000420--.name: Hmm. Okay... If $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ thinks that's best.

1124232104000372--.name: Listen, it's taking forever to put together a team of capable trackers, and I've still got to coordinate all of the Runeblades who've come to answer our call... I'm pretty sure $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ left you here to protect you from harm, but truth is it was reckless of him to leave without backup.

1204024704000421--.name: Even if you end up slowing him down a little, $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ would be safer with you at his side than going it alone. I'll take care of things here. Go and look after your teacher, yeah? $npc:11001257[gender:0]$ at the $map:63000013$ can send you where you need to go.

1124232104000373--.name: Even if you end up slowing him down a little, $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ would be safer with you at his side than going it alone. I'll take care of things here. Go and look after your teacher, yeah? $npc:11001257[gender:0]$ at the $map:63000013$ can send you where you need to go.

1124232104000374--.name:
Hm... Why have their been so many visitors lately? I'm running out of strength.
<font color="#909090">(He sighs.)</font>

1204024704000422--.name: I need you to send me after $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$.

1204024704000423--.name: Huh? You want to go all the way to $map:2000001$? Hmm... It's extremely far, which means the journey will consume a great deal of rune power... Well... If you MUST go, I'll check whether there's enough power left in the rune battery to send you. Wait here.

1124232104000376--.name: It looks like everything is ready! I can send you to $map:2000001$ at any time.

0621181204001324--.name: $MyPCName$? What brought you all this way?

0621181204001326--.name: $npcName:11001567[gender:0]$...? That man is full of surprises.

0621181204001327--.name: Well, I must admit I'm glad to have you back by my side. The path ahead is not one easily traveled alone.

0621181204001328--.name: Though the Empress promised me her aid, it seems she has a lot on her own plate. Many strange things are afoot.

0621181204001329--.name: A mysterious explosion at the Door of Light, reports of bizarre behavior by monsters around the globe...

0621181204001330--.name: The possibility that $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$'s betrayal is in some way tied to these occurrences is not beyond reason. Therefore, the best course of action is to investigate both simultaneously.

0621181204001331--.name: Thankfully, there are two of us. $MyPCName$, will you assist me by investigating these occurrences while I work alongside our brethren in Terrun Calibre to hunt down $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?

0621181204001333--.name: I admire your strength, to carry on in the face of everything you've been through in recent days.

0621181204001334--.name: In any case, I'd like you to travel to $map:02000062$ and help escort the supply caravan for the Empress's court.

0621181204001335--.name: In truth, there's no reason to suspect $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ has any nefarious plans for the goods being transported. We know what he's after, and I would never expect to find it here.

0621181204001336--.name: That said, safely escorting the caravan to Tria honors the fledgling alliance between the empire and Terrun Calibre. It's also a good opportunity to demonstrate the might of the Runeblades.

0621181204001337--.name: Your first mission is no small task. As your teacher, I hope it will serve as an opportunity for you to grow.

1202231004000378--.name: Charging into battle with an untested blade is a recipe for defeat. You would do well to familiarize yourself with your new weapon. Why not begin with the basic technique <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900031$</font>?

1202231004000379--.name: Charging into battle with an untested blade is a recipe for defeat. You would do well to familiarize yourself with your new weapon. Why not begin with the basic technique <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900031$</font>?

1202231004000380--.name: Very good. As well you know, that technique is excellent for dispatching multiple foes simultaneously.

1203154504000386--.name: Now let's try the technique <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900151$</font> on for size, just for good measure. Strike forth with relentless speed!

1203154504000387--.name: Now let's try the technique <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900151$</font> on for size, just for good measure. Strike forth with relentless speed!

1203154504000388--.name: Excellent work. It seems as though that blade was truly forged for you.

0516185004000430--.name: I need some time to think about how to clean up this little mess you've made.

0607141504000634-Striker-.name: Hahaha... If you're really worried about the wellbeing of those people you're searching for, you ought to be a lot more careful, don't you think? Maybe you shouldn't be charging in here swinging your fists around.

0607141504000636-Striker-.name: Hm... You're more of an idiot than I'd heard. Let me say it in a way your meat-brain can understand. My men here subscribe to the rules of the street. An eye for an eye and all that jazz. So if you want to hit me, I'd be prepared for the equal and opposite reaction.

0607141504000637-Striker-.name: For example, those people you're looking for—it'd be a real shame if they got hurt. Just thinking about all the terrible things that could happen to them breaks my heart. So, what's it gonna be?

0607141504000639-Striker-.name: Ah, so you're not a complete idiot. Now, I'm an honorable man. Why don't we think up an arrangement that works for the both of us? (He closes his eyes and places his hand over his chin.)

0516185004000432-Striker-.name:
......
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001623[gender:0]$ stands perfectly still, deep in thought.)</font>

0516185004000433-Striker-.name:
......
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001623[gender:0]$ stands perfectly still, deep in thought.)</font>

0516185004000434-Striker-.name: ...Okay, I've got it. I'll help you out with your missing friends—or whatever it was you came here whining about—on one condition. You take down the champion of $map:63000020$ in front of a live audience. Fair deal, right? No sweat for a big shot like you.

0530233004000486-Striker-.name: It's an underground arena where members of the criminal underworld fight for guts and glory. Fighting in a place like that would be a great way to show everybody that the Gray Wolf is just as tough as they say, right? If you're looking to make a name for yourself, that's your ticket.

0530233004000488-Striker-.name: Heheheh. Really...? I'd heard you were a $male:man,female:woman$ of principle. You know, you caped vigilante types are a real pain in my neck. If there's one type of person I'll never trust, it's a $male:man,female:woman$ without ambition. Without greed.

0530233004000490-Striker-.name: See, people who want something, they're predictable. They have a set price. And as long as you can give them what they want, you can control them.

0530233004000491-Striker-.name: But you holier-than-thou crusaders can't be bought. And getting the one thing you really want—to be a big famous hero—is a real problem for my bottom line. Well I'll let you be the hero today. Those people you're looking for? Consider them found. Just remember, if you fail to hold up your end of the bargain there'll be a price to pay.

0530233004000494-Striker-.name: Hahaha... Look kid, this has been a barrel of fun, but it's time to get down to business.

0608141904000647-Striker-.name: Someone will be waiting just outside to take you to $map:63000020$.

0630193104000761-Striker-.name: Was there something you wanted to ask me?

0530233004000496-Striker-.name: His name is $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$, but everyone knows him as the Champ. I've seen many fighters step into $map:63000020$ over the years... But the Champ is in a league of his own.

0530233004000498-Striker-.name: He's inhuman! You can hit him a hundred times and it's like he doesn't even feel it. I'm not sure he knows the meaning of the word "pain."

0530233004000500-Striker-.name: After the way you wrecked this place, I'm inclined to believe you. You may be the first person I've ever met who stands a real chance at defeating $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$.

0530233004000501-Striker-.name: The Champ's record is 47 KOs in 48 matches, and each of those knockouts were earned with a single blow. A single blow.

0530233004000502-Striker-.name: I guess the guy only takes on weaklings.

0530233004000503-Striker-.name: Hahaha. $map:63000020$ is not some back-alley affair where common thugs gather to brawl. It is a professional, world-renowned—albeit secret—fighting competition. The fact is that $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ unbelievably strong. Only one person has ever managed to hold their own against him.

0530233004000504-Striker-.name: Now, we've dallied enough. Wei Hong doesn't like delays. You'd better head to the $map:63000017$.

0530233004000505-Striker-.name: I don't care what Wei Hong dislikes.

0530233004000506-Striker-.name:
...I've radioed ahead to let them know you're coming. Talk to $npc:11001545[gender:0]$</font>. 
He'll be waiting for you in the $map:63000017$.

0530233004000507-Striker-.name: I thought you were supposed to take me there?

0530233004000508-Striker-.name: Haha. Oh my no. I have actual work to be doing. But I'm glad I got the opportunity to see you in person. Down the stairs and to the end of the hall you'll find an elevator that will take you to the $map:63000017$.

0516185004000436-Striker-.name:
...I've radioed ahead to let them know you're coming. Talk to $npc:11001545[gender:0]$</font>. 
He'll be waiting for you in the $map:63000017$. Down the stairs and to the end of the hall you'll find an elevator that will take you to there.

0516185004000437-Striker-.name: Do we have business or something? I'm a busy guy.

0530233004000510-Striker-.name: Hm? She did, did she? I guess that makes you that famous Gray Wolf. You don't look anything like they say. I don't know how tough you think you are, but are you really going to $map:63000020$ barehanded? I'm at a loss for words.

0530233004000511-Striker-.name: Do you have a problem with that?

0530233004000512-Striker-.name: See, this is why you pretentious newbies can't hack it. If you don't have the skills, you've gotta make up for it with the gear.

0530233004000513-Striker-.name: I don't need gear, just my fists.

0530233004000514-Striker-.name: Pfft, what a show-off. Listen, you can lie to yourself all you want, but I'm not letting you enter $map:63000020$ unarmed. It'd be undignified. Here, take this. It's nothing fancy but it's better than nothing, eh?

0530233004000515-Striker-.name: Somebody tossed it down here after losing a match. One man's trash, eh?

0516185004000438-Striker-.name: See with those knuckles at least I can take you seriously. Now you look more like a proper fighter. Of course, you'll still get obliterated by the Champ, but you'll fit in competing in $map:63000020$.

0530233004000517-Striker-.name: Yeah I'd love to, but y'see we're dealing with a bit of an emergency here.... You may have noticed but a whole bunch of $npcPlural:29000098$ have sluiced their way up from the sewers, and they're running amok. We released the hounds to deal with them, but there's still another more pressing issue...

0530233004000518-Striker-.name: What, are you gonna take care of it for me?

0607141504000643-Striker-.name: I don't have time to sit around waiting for you to take care of it.

0530233004000522-Striker-.name: Hmph. You wanna help kid? Fine. Those $npcPlural:29000098$ swallowed a bunch of $itemPlural:30000553$, and we need them back. If you think you're such hot stuff, then go and recover them for me.

0530233004000523-Striker-.name:
If I don't get those ledgers back, the boss'll have my head.
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001545[gender:0]$'s expression sours after mentioning 'the boss.')</font>

0516185004000439-Striker-.name: Well, big shot? Did you get my $itemPlural:30000553$ back from those $npcPlural:29000098$?

0516185004000440-Striker-.name: Do you have them? Did you find our ledgers?

0530233004000525-Striker-.name: Eugh... The pages are covered in goop. Still, it's a good thing you found them. I guess you've got some fight in you after all!

0516185004000441-Striker-.name: Well, now that the fire is out, I guess I can leave this mess to whoever's on the next shift.

0530233004000527-Striker-.name:
All right, all right. Let's go then. Right this way to $map:63000020$.
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001545[gender:0]$'s walkie-talkie begins to crackle noisily.)</font>

0607141504000644-Striker-.name:
<font color="#909090">(He puts the walkie-talkie up to his ear.)</font>
Yeah, whaddya want? What?! Really? Darn it. Fine, I'm on my way.

0530233004000528-Striker-.name:
Heh... Sorry buddy but I've got another fire to put out. You'll have to find your own way. Sigh, it's always something.
<font color="#909090">(He shrugs and gives you a sheepish smile.)</font>

0530233004000529-Striker-.name: Maybe this time you can take care of your own problems.

0530233004000530-Striker-.name: Hey, no need to be so snippy. I'll call my associate on the walkie-talkie and tell him to expect you. Head to the $map:63000018$ and talk to my man $npc:11001546[gender:0]$. He'll get you registered for the fight and tell you anything you want to know.

0530233004000532-Striker-.name: And one last thing. I don't know if you really are the infamous Gray Wolf, but...

0627171504000759-Striker-.name: When you take on the Champ, don't stop punching 'til he's on the ground. If you give him even a single opening, you're done for.

0516185004000442-Striker-.name: Head to the $map:63000018$ and talk to my man $npc:11001546[gender:0]$. He'll get you registered for the fight and tell you anything you want to know.

0516185004000443-Striker-.name: What are you looking at? Looking to start something?

0530233004000533-Striker-.name: Didn't $npc:11001545[gender:0]$ tell you I was coming?

0530233004000534-Striker-.name: $npc:11001545[gender:0]$...? Oh! It's you! You're the one going up against the Champ! They say you're the Gray Wolf, the $male:guy,female:lady$ who beats criminals into submission with $male:his,female:her$ bare fists...! Wait. You're the Gray Wolf...?

0530233004000535-Striker-.name: ($npc:11001546[gender:0]$'s stares at you skeptically.) I thought you'd be taller. And a lot more muscular... But you're tiny! Are you sure you can fight? $npc:11001545[gender:0]$, you moron. You must've sent me the wrong $male:guy,female:broad$.

0607141504000645-Striker-.name: I'm the one who's going to take down $map:63000020$'s champion.

0530233004000536-Striker-.name: What? You're saying you're the right person? Hold on, I've gotta call this in... (He picks up his walkie-talkie.)

0530233004000538-Striker-.name:
<font color="#909090">(The walkie-talkie crackles.)</font>
Hey yeah, you said you were sending the Gray Wolf over, but it was some scrawny kid who showed up. Yeah! I'm staring right at 'em! What? Really? Boss's orders...? Fine.

0531171204000628-Striker-.name:
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001546[gender:0]$ eyes you with increased skepticism.)</font>
I don't believe it...

0516185004000444-Striker-.name: Stop staring at me and spit it out.

0530233004000540-Striker-.name: When's my fight going to start?

0530233004000541-Striker-.name: Your fight is an impromptu match. You're going to have to wait for the main event to finish, and even then, you only go on if the boss makes the call.

0530233004000542-Striker-.name: I don't have time to sit around waiting.

0530233004000543-Striker-.name: Open your eyes and look around, punk. This place is full of famous fighters, all getting ready for their match with the big guy. You don't get special treatment.

0530233004000544-Striker-.name: $map:63000020$ is famous for the brutality of its fights. If you have any brains in your head, you should be rooting for them to rough up the Champ a little before he gets to you, because it's the only shot you've got.

0530233004000545-Striker-.name: $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ is an absolute beast! I can't believe somebody as puny as you is going to fight him. Hey I've got an idea, instead of standing here bothering me, why don't you go warm up with an opponent who's a little closer to your level, like that punching bag over there.

0530233004000547-Striker-.name: There you go. You oughtta loosen up those muscles so when the Champ hits you, you don't wrench anything on the way down to the mat.

0516185004000445-Striker-.name: Quit bothering me. Why don't you go warm up on that punching bag over there?

0530233004000549-Striker-.name: Well, you'll be out cold in one hit. I guess there's no need for you to work up a sweat.

0530233004000550-Striker-.name: I eat chumps like your "Champ" for breakfast.

0530233004000551-Striker-.name: Wow, check out the ego on this $male:guy,female:girl$. You're downright certifiable. But don't worry, you'll probably be talking to the head doctor anyway after $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ wipes the floor with you.

0530233004000552-Striker-.name: Of course what's really crazy is that they're letting you fight the Champ in a surprise title match. That's unheard of! Did you win some kind of contest? Oh jeez, you're not dying are you?

0531175204000633-Striker-.name: Or maybe this is just the boss's way of taking out the trash. If that's the case, I feel sorry for you, buddy.

0516185004000447-Striker-.name: I can't help but wonder if you realize what you've gotten yourself into. You know what kind of place $map:63000020$ is, right?

0530233004000553-Striker-.name: If you're not a top notch fighter, you could be looking at spending the rest of your life in the hospital. So if you're having any second thoughts, I'm willing to turn a blind eye while you sneak out of here. No? Huh...

0530233004000554-Striker-.name: Is there something you're not telling me? Like, do you have some kind of special technique? Or maybe like, a cyborg arm? C'mon, you've got to show me something—anything! I'll even give you some pointers!

0516185004000448-Striker-.name: Is there something you're not telling me? Like, do you have some kind of special technique? Or maybe like, a cyborg arm? C'mon, you've got to show me something—anything! I'll even give you some pointers!

0516185004000449-Striker-.name: ...Wh-what was that? I could've sworn you just shot a ball of energy from your fist... I must be imagining things.

0530233004000555-Striker-.name: Do you have a problem with that?

0530233004000556-Striker-.name:
A problem? W-what? Of course not. Hahaha! Anyone can perform a technique like that...
<font color="#909090">(He starts to sweat.)</font>

0516185004000450-Striker-.name: You're gonna need something better than that to take on the Champ. So if you've got some kind of secret technique, then show it to me.

0516185004000451-Striker-.name: You're gonna need something better than that to take on the Champ. So if you've got some kind of secret technique, then show it to me.

0516185004000452-Striker-.name:
... 
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001546[gender:0]$ stares silently into the distance.)</font>

0530233004000557-Striker-.name: Would you say that technique could be performed by anyone?

0630193104000762-Striker-.name: ...Ahh! Oh—are you talking ab-b-bout that technique?

0530233004000558-Striker-.name: I mean... Sure, not just anybody could pull it off... But you're, uh, still not at my level!

0530233004000559-Striker-.name: I would love to see your skills. Maybe I'll learn something.

0530233004000560-Striker-.name:
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001546[gender:0]$ looks surprised and insulted at the same time.)</font> 
...Of course. Just don't blink, or you might just miss it! Here I go... On the count of three!

0530233004000561-Striker-.name:
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001546[gender:0]$ rolls his shoulder and stretches his neck.)</font> 
All, right. Here we go! One! Two! Two and a half! Now remember, watch carefully so you don't miss anything, all right? All right then. One! Two—

0530233004000562-Striker-.name: It's all right, you don't have to embarrass yourself.

0530233004000563-Striker-.name:
Why you little! I lost my timing because you distracted me. I'll show you how it's really done!
<font color="#909090">(He gets into a fighting stance and winds up for a punch, but then makes a great show of gripping his shoulder and wincing.)</font>

0530233004000565-Striker-.name: Aggh... It seems my injury hasn't fully healed yet... I guess I won't be able to show you my most powerful skills today. That's just too bad.

0530233004000566-Striker-.name: Really? But you were just stretching. How'd you injure yourself?

0530233004000567-Striker-.name: Hey! What's with all the questions? It's none of your damn business!

0516185004000453-Striker-.name: Look alive, kid. I just got a call on the walkie-talkie. Boss wants to see you. Head to the $map:63000019$.

0530233004000568-Striker-.name: When's my match going to start?

0530233004000569-Striker-.name: The match starts whenever the boss says it does! If you want to fight, you'd better go see him in the $map:63000019$.

0516185004000454-Striker-.name: The boss wants to see you. Go to the $map:63000019$. You're not stupid enough to make the boss wait, are you?

0530233004000570-Striker-.name: I hear our fighters are ready for the main event.

0530233004000571-Striker-.name: When's my match going to start?

0530233004000572-Striker-.name: Heheheh... Your match is starting real soon. There's no need to bug me about it. Now, there's someone here you should meet before your fight.

0531171204000630-Striker-.name: The one and only reigning champion, the indomitable $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$. He's got abs like steel and a punch like a two-ton truck. His foes know him as the Titanium Fist, but his adoring fans just call him the Champ. Remember that face.

0516185004000458-Striker-.name: An all-out rumble between the Gray Wolf and $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$! What a momentous occasion. This calls for a toast! Why don't you join me for a drink before your fight?

0530233004000575-Striker-.name: You're not getting soft on me, are you Wei Hong?

0530233004000576-Striker-.name: Hahaha... What? So we don't agree on everything, does that mean we can't share a quiet drink together? Or... are you worried I might have poisoned it?

0530233004000577-Striker-.name: I wouldn't put it past you.

0530233004000578-Striker-.name:
What kind of lowly thug do you take me for? If I wanted to kill you, I would have had my guards turn you into swiss cheese back in my office. Why would I go out of my way and put on such a show?
<font color="#909090">(He does have a point...)</font>

0607141504000646-Striker-.name: ...In that case, I guess I have no reason to refuse.

0531171204000632-Striker-.name: That's the spirit! Go see the $npc:11001624[gender:0]$, he'll whip you up a delectable beverage. He knows just the one.

0516185004000459-Striker-.name: That's the spirit! Go see the $npc:11001624[gender:0]$, he'll whip you up a delectable beverage. He knows just the one.

0530233004000580-Striker-.name: $npc:11001623[gender:0]$ said you had something special on tap.

0530233004000581-Striker-.name: Oh, I know just the one. It's a juice made from a medley of very rare and very expensive fruits. Wait right here and I'll pour you a glass in a jiffy.

0530233004000583-Striker-.name: <font color="#909090">(He looks over the bottles on the wall before settling on the right one and retrieving it. He grabs an empty glass set conspicuously apart from the other glasses, and slowly and carefully begins filling it.)</font>

0530233004000585-Striker-.name: Here you go. $item:20000314$. It's quite expensive, so be sure to drink it slowly and really savor the aroma.

0516185004000461-Striker-.name: Ah, you're finally up and about. How do you feel?

0530233004000587-Striker-.name: If you're talking about your fight with $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$... You lost.

0530233004000588-Striker-.name: I already know that, but how?

0530233004000590-Striker-.name: I think you know exactly what I mean.

0530233004000591-Striker-.name: Sigh... I thought your fight with $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ reeked of foul-play. I'll have you know, I had no involvement in that.

0530233004000592-Striker-.name: I passed out at the beginning of the match—before I'd even broken a sweat.

0530233004000593-Striker-.name: Well, I can only speculate as to what happened. Did you perhaps eat or drink anything before the match?

0530233004000594-Striker-.name: I did drink something in the $map:63000019$.

0530233004000595-Striker-.name: Ah, well that would do it. I suspect there was something extra in your drink. An old trick used by fight fixers when a fighter was too self-righteous to take a dive. Still, I'm surprised you'd fall for it.

0530233004000597-Striker-.name: I can't blame you. Wei Hong's a smooth talker when he needs to be. Well, what's done is done. He'll want to speak with you. You should head to the $map:63000022$.

0516185004000462-Striker-.name: The boss is waiting for you. You should head to the $map:63000022$.

0516185004000463-Striker-.name: You seem upset. Well, if you have something to say, spit it out.

0530233004000598-Striker-.name: You should be ashamed of yourself.

0530233004000599-Striker-.name: Hahahaha! What do I have to be ashamed of? A win is a win, no matter how you come by it.

0530233004000600-Striker-.name: I came here expecting a fair fight.

0530233004000601-Striker-.name: A fair fight? Well there's your first mistake. This was a business transaction, plain and simple. I had something you wanted, and you had something I wanted. I may have told you what'd happen if you won, but I never said I'd let you.

0530233004000602-Striker-.name: Now listen up, loser. There are no rules in battle, especially here. All tactics are on the table. You lost fair and square. There is no "honor" in the arena, just victory or defeat.

0530233004000603-Striker-.name: That's ridiculous. You cheated, so the fight's outcome is invalid.

0530233004000604-Striker-.name: Tell that to the audience. They came here to watch their beloved Champ prevail over the terrible Gray Wolf, and that's what they saw. That's the only outcome that matters. If you go around running your mouth about "fairness," all they're gonna see is a sore loser.

0530233004000606-Striker-.name: Ah, sweet, glorious silence. That's more like it. Now, as I recall we had a deal. You said you'd take down the Champ, and you failed.

0516185004000464-Striker-.name: Now, I'm a generous man. So even though you failed to hold up your end up the bargain, I'll see to it those people you're looking for go free. But I expect something in return.

0530233004000607-Striker-.name: What do you want from me?

0530233004000608-Striker-.name: Let's get something straight, kid. You work for me now. You may be a big deal in $map:02000100$, but to me you're just another errand $male:boy,female:girl$. I say jump, you shut up and jump. Now, are you up for a little errand?

0622151604001362-Striker-.name: You're catching on quick. Good, good. Let's talk business, shall we? Now, have you heard that Empress $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ is throwing an event in $map:02000001$?

0622151604001364-Striker-.name: Pfft... Turning a blind eye toward the rest of the world? You've got no class. Sigh, you're not worth my time.

0622151604001365-Striker-.name: How about I assign you some handlers? They'll tell you about the job. And maybe if you pay attention, one day you'll be worthy of taking orders from me.

0622151604001367-Striker-.name: Of course not. Haven't you been paying any attention? Now get out of my sight! Your handlers will be waiting for you in the $map:63000023$.

0516185004000465-Striker-.name: Your handlers are waiting for you at the $map:63000023$. Now get out of my sight!

0516185004000466-Striker-.name: Can't you see I'm in the middle of something? Huh? Oh, it's you. I've been waiting for you, $MyPCName$.

0530233004000618-Striker-.name: Are you the people $npc:11001629[gender:0]$ told me to see?

0530233004000619-Striker-.name: "$npc:11001629[gender:0]$?" You think you two are chums? Show some respect! You'll call him "Boss" from now on.

0530233004000621-Striker-.name: Yeah... but he really is though. You may not be on payroll, but you're following his orders aren't you? So suck it up and call him boss.

0608142504000648-Striker-.name: From here on out, we'll be watching you, so no funny business. We call, you answer, no detours.

0516185004000467-Striker-.name: Ready for your first job? Time's a-waistin'.

0621181504001361-Striker-.name: What am I supposed to do?

0621181204001339-Striker-.name: I don't know if you're caught up on current events, but it's been ages since the Empress has held any public shindigs in $map:02000001$. And now the dame's planning to rub elbows with the commonfolk? People'll be flocking in from all over to see her. And when people get together, there's money to be made.

0621181204001340-Striker-.name: In his infinite wisdom, the boss has already cornered the market on all kinds of goods that will be sold during the festivities. We just need to get them to $map:02000001$ safe and sound, and the money will start flowing in.

0621181204001341-Striker-.name: Your mission is to escort our goods to Tria safely. We've already made arrangements for you to be part of the caravan guard. Just head to $map:02000062$, and the royal guards will fill you in on the rest.

0621181204001342-Striker-.name: Your muscle is the only thing standing between our extremely valuable goods and all sorts of wannabe highwaymen looking to get their little grubby mitts on our stuff. I expect you to take this assignment seriously.

0621181204001343-Striker-.name: This mission should be a walk in the park for the notorious Gray Wolf. Now if there's no more questions, there's a car waiting to take you to $map:02000062$. Get a move on.

0516185004000468-Striker-.name: I've hired a car to take you straight to $map:02000062$, hurry up and get in.

0621181204001344-Striker-.name: Hello! You look like an adventurer. We happen to be looking to hire caravan guards, if you're interested.

0621181204001346-Striker-.name: Haha, you look pretty tough. It'll be good to have you with us. Go on inside and introduce yourself to the guy in charge.

0523180604000472-Striker-.name: The boss is waiting for you.

0523181104000481-Striker-.name: The boss is waiting for you.

0523181104000484-Striker-.name: What? Fine? That's it? I have to say I'm disappointed in your reaction. That particular beverage is very hard to come by.

0608142504000649-Striker-.name: Heheheh. I can't tell whether you have extremely expensive taste, or you're just some country bumpkin who wouldn't know good juice if someone poured it down their gullet.

0626234604000650-SoulBinder-.name: What? I'm not going to get your orb for you. I had to stash it in the showcase there when we brought you here. It's just there to the left, grab it while I mentally prepare to exert myself again.

0626234604000653-SoulBinder-.name: What? I'm not going to get your orb for you. I had to stash it in the showcase there when we brought you here. It's just there to the left, grab it while I mentally prepare to exert myself again.

0626234604000654-SoulBinder-.name: Maybe it's just me, but you look a little awkward handling that orb. Are you sure you're up for this?

0626234604000656-SoulBinder-.name: I'm not so sure. We can rest a little bit more before heading out. I would prefer that...

0716001104000780-SoulBinder-.name: Ahh, never mind. I know that look you get. Fine, at least take this with you. It'll perk you right up if you start fading again.

0626234604000657-SoulBinder-.name: This really is the perfect day to stay in and read a couple dozen of the ancient texts... Gah, I've got to stop thinking like that. Brother $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ would come after me eventually if I tried to hide in here.

0626234604000659-SoulBinder-.name:
And it seems like you've more or less regained your strength...
You should start heading to <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000025$</font>.

0626234604000660-SoulBinder-.name:
You should start heading to <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000025$</font>.
You are ready, right?

0626234604000661-SoulBinder-.name: You know by now that the purpose of our training is to find unity with nature. This is a long and exhausting practice... and I begin to wonder if your frail human form will last long enough to complete it.

0716001104000781-SoulBinder-.name: Then I should resume training immediately.

0626234604000663-SoulBinder-.name: I think not. I'm not convinced you won't end up flat on your face again. Effort is wasted if it does not lead to growth. Now, tell me. Do you know why your mind and body are so weak?

0716001104000782-SoulBinder-.name: Yes, because my animus is not my own.

0716001104000783-SoulBinder-.name: So, you remember your roots. Yes, your animus was given to you by the master, a noble sacrifice to save your life. That is why you must strive to be worthy of those energies, honed over centuries of training and meditation.

0716001104000784-SoulBinder-.name: Considering the incredible power of your borrowed animus, contained within your untrained body, it is clear to see where the issue lies. You are incredibly out of balance.

0720013904000916-SoulBinder-.name: Should the mind or the body fall out of balance, the result is sickness and despair. You appear to be suffering from both at once. This is why diligent training is so essential, to help you find your balance.

0626234604000664-SoulBinder-.name: Now, are you ready to begin?

0626234604000665-SoulBinder-.name: Yes, but what should I begin with?

0626234604000666-SoulBinder-.name: We shall start with the basics once more, training your sense of balance. You will balance on pillars until you find your center.

0716001104000785-SoulBinder-.name: Is that really necessary? I've already-

0716001104000786-SoulBinder-.name: If I could trust you to stay conscious during training, perhaps not. But your weakness demands that you master the basics before moving on.

0716001104000788-SoulBinder-.name: You are weak. This exercise trains your balance, dexterity, stamina, and focus. Come, find the pillars here in the pond.

0727122904000919-SoulBinder-.name: Usually we use dozens of pillars to practice moving between, but for you we have only two. Climb to the highest pillar and practice your kata without falling.

0626234604000667-SoulBinder-.name:
What are you staring at?
If you're ready, climb up the <font color="#ffd200">tallest pillar</font>.

0626234604000668-SoulBinder-.name: What's that look for? Do you think you've made some great breakthrough?

0626234604000669-SoulBinder-.name: I did climb the tallest pillar, as ordered.

0626234604000670-SoulBinder-.name: Yes, I can see that. You did as ordered, and no more. Were you a sturdier, more studious pupil, these basic exercises wouldn't even be necessary. You have a long path ahead of you.

0716001104000789-SoulBinder-.name: Does that mean I need to climb the pillar again?

0716001104000790-SoulBinder-.name: No, you've gotten what you need from that exercise, at least.

0626234604000671-SoulBinder-.name: Let's see how you are with your skills at the moment. First, how confident do you feel? Be honest. I have no love for liars.

0626234604000672-SoulBinder-.name: I think you have more to say about it than I do.

0719224504000876-SoulBinder-.name: Can we skip the talking? I want to train.

0626234604000673-SoulBinder-.name: I have less to say about you than you might think. But you've already been here for four seasons, and your power is potent, thanks to its source. In my opinion, you should have significant control of your animus already.

0720013904000917-SoulBinder-.name: Clearly you do not, so once again it is necessary to return to the basics. We shall review the concept of animus once again.

0716001104000791-SoulBinder-.name: So tell me, $MyPCName$! What is animus?

0716001104000792-SoulBinder-.name: It's a force produced from the harmony of the individual with nature.

0716001104000793-SoulBinder-.name: I used to know, but my memory's failing me at the moment.

0716001104000794-SoulBinder-.name: It's an incredible power we can crush our foes with.

0716001104000795-SoulBinder-.name: To break down the boundaries between the self and the wider world, and to take the powers of both and create one unified force... That is animus at its most basic. Those from the outside world draw upon similar powers and call it magic.

0716001104000796-SoulBinder-.name: Animus is at the heart of our teachings. All of our techniques require command of animus to use.

0716001104000798-SoulBinder-.name: Your memory has a history of failure, it seems. I wonder how much of my life has been wasted teaching you the same facts over and over and over again...

0716001104000799-SoulBinder-.name: To break down the boundaries between the self and the wider world, and to take the powers of both and create one unified force... That is animus at its most basic. Those from the outside world draw upon similar powers and call it magic.

0716001104000801-SoulBinder-.name: Crush our...? How is it that you have lived among us for so long and have learned nothing, $MyPCName$?!

0716001104000803-SoulBinder-.name: Never again will I hear such words escape your lips, do you understand? I will explain animus, and you will listen and engrave my words upon your heart!

0716001104000805-SoulBinder-.name: To break down the boundaries between the self and the wider world, and to take the powers of both and create one unified force... That is animus at its most basic. Those from the outside world draw upon similar powers and call it magic.

0720004404000890-SoulBinder-.name: Is that so? It is foolhardy to rush into training without an understanding of your abilities. I advise to you heed my words.

0720004404000892-SoulBinder-.name: I feel ready. Let's get to it.

0720004404000893-SoulBinder-.name: Now, then... We shall begin with $skill:11100011$. It's a fine starting point for beginners, as you simply need to condense your animus into a ball and throw it. Go on, then. Show me your $skill:11100011$!

0626234604000674-SoulBinder-.name:
I see you've yet to reach enlightenment. Focus on your training!
We'll start with <font color="#ffd200">$skill:11100011$</font>.

0626234604000675-SoulBinder-.name: Are you waiting for praise? You proved you can manipulate animus in the most basic way possible. I am yet unimpressed. So, what will you show me next?

0626234604000677-SoulBinder-.name: Your $skill:11100011$ is hardly more complicated than expelling animus from your body. But $skill:11100041$ is rather different.

0720013904000918-SoulBinder-.name: Drawing upon such a large quantity of animus requires great focus, not just to use but to keep from escaping or exploding.

0626234604000678-SoulBinder-.name: Whereas $skill:11100011$ allows you to form and attack with animus, $skill:11100041$ is an open channelling of that power. When finesse is no longer enough, this is the skill you need to master.

0716001104000808-SoulBinder-.name: The key is to sense the flow of animus as it escapes you. With a skill this powerful, you can drain yourself of animus and put yourself in danger. Never forget that you can use $skill:11100011$ to revitalize your animus should you run low.

0729223304000936-SoulBinder-.name: The actual use of the skill is quite simple. Just bring forth your animus, and release it in a direction. Do not close back up, let the power flow forth until it is no longer needed. Can you remember that?

0720004404000894-SoulBinder-.name: $skill:11100041$ is not a skill to be taken lightly. Are you certain you do not wish to review?

0720004404000896-SoulBinder-.name: I'm ready. Let me prove it.

0720004404000897-SoulBinder-.name: Then what are you waiting for? Show me your $skill:11100041$!

0626234604000681-SoulBinder-.name: Then what are you waiting for? Show me your $skill:11100041$!

0626234604000682-SoulBinder-.name: Hm... It would appear you have the basics down, more or less.

0626234604000683-SoulBinder-.name: When can I start learning more advanced skills?

0626234604000684-SoulBinder-.name: New skills? Do you think that you are ready?

0716001104000812-SoulBinder-.name: I passed inspection, didn't I? I'm ready for something new.

0716001104000813-SoulBinder-.name: As $npc:11001556[gender:0]$ has said, it is more important to remember what you've learned than to sacrifice it for something new.

0716001104000814-SoulBinder-.name: Given your difficulties elsewhere in your training, I believe that is what you would risk doing.

0626234604000685-SoulBinder-.name: $MyPCName$, you need to focus on your own tasks. The master instructed me to send you over once your training concluded. So I suggest you go and meet him immediately.

0626234604000686-SoulBinder-.name: Where can I find the master?

0626234604000687-SoulBinder-.name: Do you really need to ask? You'll find him at $map:63000029$, of course. You'll reach it by taking the northern path from $map:63000014$. But surely you knew that much.

0626234604000688-SoulBinder-.name:
You'll find $map:63000029$ once you pass $map:63000014$'s northern path. 
For now, head towards <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000014$</font>.

0626234604000689-SoulBinder-.name: He said he would be right back. Is he testing me again?

0626234604000690-SoulBinder-.name: Wait, weren't you going to go with $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$?

0626234604000691-SoulBinder-.name: Ah, he said he was tired of my complaining and wanted me to wait here for a moment. But it's turning into a pretty long moment!

0626234604000692-SoulBinder-.name: I really hope he didn't up and ditch me.

0626234604000693-SoulBinder-.name: He wouldn't do that. You, on the other hand...

0719224504000879-SoulBinder-.name: I shouldn't keep the master waiting.

0626234604000694-SoulBinder-.name: Excuse me? Did I hear you correctly with my giant, infallible ears?

0716001104000815-SoulBinder-.name: Surely not, I was talking about you lending a hand.

0716001104000816-SoulBinder-.name: Mm hm. Well... I suppose I can't wait here forever. If you've got to meet the master, I'll just go check on the barrier stone in $map:63000014$. All by myself. With no one to help. Alone.

0716001104000817-SoulBinder-.name: Yep, good luck. I'm off to see the master.

0716001104000818-SoulBinder-.name: Oh, yeah! Definitely, yeah, you get going. Just scamper on off, do your own thing. I mean, we spent all morning together... You, resting in bed, and me, watching over you like a mother hen. It was no trouble, really. I'm a little winded, but I can attend to myself... someday, I guess.

0716001104000819-SoulBinder-.name: I should consider it a gift, maybe, that I have so much love and attention to give others. And gifts don't need to be repaid in kind... I can just keep supporting you, and Junta, and all of Guidance forever and ever, on my own, the rock upon which everyone stands without a care in the world...

0716001104000820-SoulBinder-.name: If I help you, will you stop talking?

0716001104000821-SoulBinder-.name: Oh, come on! Junta wandered off and I could use a hand. You're just going to walk away in my time of need?

0720004404000898-SoulBinder-.name: All right, $npcName:11001655[gender:1]$, get on with it.

0720004404000900-SoulBinder-.name: You bet! And thanks for volunteering to help. I knew I could count on you.

0626234604000695-SoulBinder-.name: Fine, how about if I check the barrier stone behind me, and you check the one across the bridge there? And I just want to say, it's great that you volunteered to help without me even needing to ask! You're a real pal.

0626234604000696-SoulBinder-.name: Finally... I can finally catch a nap while the others are away...

0626234604000698-SoulBinder-.name: WHA-! Hah, hoo... How are you back already? I thought...

0716001104000822-SoulBinder-.name: The barrier stone is like ten feet away. I'm done.

0716001104000823-SoulBinder-.name: W-well... That's right. I sent you to that one, and not the one on the other side of the mountain. Of course. Er, good job.

0626234604000699-SoulBinder-.name: Considering how quickly you took care of the stone, that only makes it stranger that $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ is nowhere to be found... Ah, but you need to meet with the master, don't you?

0626234604000700-SoulBinder-.name: Do you know why the master wants to see me?

0719224504000880-SoulBinder-.name: Yes. I'll be on my way.

0626234604000701-SoulBinder-.name: There's no point in speculating, really. You'll find out when you meet him. Maybe he wants to talk about your training, maybe he has advice for you...

0716001104000824-SoulBinder-.name: I hope it's not like $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$'s advice.

0716001104000825-SoulBinder-.name: Ha! Oh, don't take $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ so hard. You know how obsessed he is with his training. And to him, everyone else should be working just as hard.

0716001104000826-SoulBinder-.name: He's so gruff and inflexible about everything... But he does it because he cares so much. Under that hardened, feathered shell is a warm heart, beating for his brothers and sisters here. I mean, t-that's just how he strikes me. When I think about him. Not that I think about him much...

0716001104000827-SoulBinder-.name: Anyway! I'm sure whatever the master wants to discuss with you will be quite illuminating. You run along and have fun, and I'll join you after I finish up here and have a little sit-down. The entrance to $map:63000029$ is in $map:63000026$, so it should be easy to find.

0719224504000881-SoulBinder-.name: Leaving so soon? I expected you to ask me why the master wants to see you...

0720004404000902-SoulBinder-.name: I will know when I see the master myself.

0720004404000903-SoulBinder-.name: Goodness, how insightful of you! I guess your head's cleared from this morning. All right, the entrance to $map:63000029$ is in $map:63000026$, so it should be easy to find. I'll catch up eventually.

0626234604000702-SoulBinder-.name: Goodness, how insightful of you! I guess your head's cleared from this morning. All right, the entrance to $map:63000029$ is in $map:63000026$, so it should be easy to find. I'll catch up eventually.

0626234604000703-SoulBinder-.name: ...Perhaps it was selfish of me to wish that things could stay like this forever...
