0626234604000704-SoulBinder-.name: Where are we? And... who are you?

0719224504000882-SoulBinder-.name: This makes no sense, and I want to leave.

0626234604000705-SoulBinder-.name: Hm? Ah, I see. You don't remember me... That's a relief. You must understand, this was not my intention. I simply... when they came...

0716001104000829-SoulBinder-.name: Shadows... dark shadows... they will show you the light...

0716001104000830-SoulBinder-.name: That doesn't answer my question in the slightest.

0716001104000831-SoulBinder-.name: No slight. No answer, either. All you need for now is to survive...

0716001104000833-SoulBinder-.name: You are alive. They will hunt you as long as you are alive. Death is not helpful. Fight or run. Your choice...

0716001104000834-SoulBinder-.name: We're going in circles. Did you bring me here?

0716001104000835-SoulBinder-.name: Bring? How could you be brought here? When they appeared, it brought a memory to the surface...

0716001104000836-SoulBinder-.name: Do you actually answer questions? At all?

0716001104000837-SoulBinder-.name: I have no answers for impatience. And I will not keep you here long.

0716001104000838-SoulBinder-.name: It is what you told me... But ah, we've wasted too much time. You must take this.

0716001104000840-SoulBinder-.name: If you are to remember, you will need your power. I can lend you my strength... but only if he never learns of it...

0716001104000841-SoulBinder-.name: It isn't much. But you will need it. For the future...

0720004404000904-SoulBinder-.name: Your sense... Who you are... Why you are here... You care not for this sense?

0720004404000906-SoulBinder-.name: I don't even know what you're saying. Can I leave this place?

0719224504000883-SoulBinder-.name: Yes. But take this. It is my strength, that you might remember your lost power through it. The time is coming when it will serve you well...

0626234604000706-SoulBinder-.name: It was too much, I see that now. It could never stay... as it was...

0626234604000707-SoulBinder-.name: What is this power you're talking about? And who are you?

0626234604000708-SoulBinder-.name: I would answer if I could... But he is here. I can feel it. You must go...

0626234604000709-SoulBinder-.name: I would answer if I could... But he is here. I can feel it. You must go...

0626234604000710-SoulBinder-.name: I have a feeling this group we just dealt with was only the first wave. We must prepare for a larger attack. I trust that you both can find the resolve to defend all that we hold dear?

0626234604000711-SoulBinder-.name: Shouldn't we be treating your wound first?

0626234604000712-SoulBinder-.name:
It's nothing. Our time is better spent preparing our defenses.
<font color="#909090">(He's struggling to hide the pain... Something is very wrong.)</font>

0626234604000713-SoulBinder-.name: What worries me most is that I have no idea what those things are. Between their numbers and their strange energy... Hmm, you...

0626234604000715-SoulBinder-.name: Perhaps. I sense... a very similar energy from you...

0730004604000937-SoulBinder-.name: ...No, forget I said anything. Surely I must be mistaken.

0626234604000716-SoulBinder-.name:
...Perhaps I'm jumping to <font color="#ffd200">conclusions</font>. 
Forget it.

0626234604000717-SoulBinder-.name: Did you see that? More of those things, rushing in like the tide! What are they?

0626234604000718-SoulBinder-.name: I don't know, but at least you were able to hold them off.

0626234604000719-SoulBinder-.name: I suppose... But that just means we need to prepare for even larger assaults.

0626234604000720-SoulBinder-.name: We have no time to lose. $MyPCName$, block the cave entrance with a rock. I doubt it will keep them out forever, but it'll buy us some time.

0626234604000723-SoulBinder-.name: We have no time to lose. $MyPCName$, block the cave entrance with a rock. I doubt it will keep them out forever, but it'll buy us some time.

0626234604000724-SoulBinder-.name: Did you get a good look at the creatures that now threaten our home?

0626234604000725-SoulBinder-.name: I did, but... I've never seen them before.

0719224504000884-SoulBinder-.name: Does it matter? We need to do something now.

0716001104000842-SoulBinder-.name: They are shadows risen from darkness itself. Long ago, I had a passing vision of this day. And for some time, I've felt the darkness gathering around Halo Mountain.

0716001104000843-SoulBinder-.name: Why didn't you tell us sooner?

0716001104000844-SoulBinder-.name: ...You recall that we found you breathing your last in the Land of Darkness, yes?

0716001104000845-SoulBinder-.name: I do. And I wouldn't be here if you hadn't sacrificed so much to save me.

0716001104000846-SoulBinder-.name: In truth, my sacrifice was not purely out of compassion. When I chanced upon you that day... I was but a single spoke in the great wheel of fate.

0716001104000847-SoulBinder-.name: A very long time ago, I was plagued by a terrible nightmare. The same dark dream haunted me, night after night... Eventually I came to recognize it as an omen. And I realized that when I found you there, in the Land of Darkness.

0716001104000849-SoulBinder-.name:
It was but a voice, repeating the same terrifying words.
"The soul that falls in the cliff's skyless shadow
Shall find their fate in the balance of nature.
When the Lord of Death rises, the keeper of shades,
The soul shall join the Seven Stars in their war."

0716001104000850-SoulBinder-.name: When I found you, I realized that you were the soul spoken of in my vision. I believe you have a great destiny ahead of you... but for you to reach it, I first had to save you.

0716001104000851-SoulBinder-.name: I'm not sure I can live up to those expectations.

0716001104000852-SoulBinder-.name: It is natural for you to be uncertain. After all, I speak of events to come, events the likes of which you have never faced. But great trials lead to great deeds, and you will not know if you are ready for those trials until you face them. Perhaps this now is the first of your trials...

0716001104000853-SoulBinder-.name: Above all, we cannot hope to reach true balance and harmony without struggle. Conflict is the test, challenging us to learn, adapt, and build in new ways. I have confidence that this threat we face will change Guidance forever, and open a new path forward for all of us.

0716001104000854-SoulBinder-.name: That's great, but I need to know what to do next.

0716001104000855-SoulBinder-.name: ...You never were a fan of my speeches. Fine, let's have you face our unwelcome guests at last.

0716001104000856-SoulBinder-.name:
Afterwards... Well, that can wait. There are other matters we must discuss, you and I.
<font color="#909090">(For a moment, a grim shadow passes across the master's face.)</font>

0720004404000907-SoulBinder-.name: Just because the problem is apparent, does not mean the solution is similarly so. Do you really intend to rush into action without considering the consequences?

0720004404000908-SoulBinder-.name: No, let's hear what you have to say.

0719224504000885-SoulBinder-.name: ...You never were a fan of my speeches, were you? Fine, let's have you face our unwelcome guests at last.

0626234604000727-SoulBinder-.name: The fate of Halo Mountain and Guidance has been determined. I know what we must do.

0626234604000728-SoulBinder-.name: Are you sure you don't need some time?

0719224504000886-SoulBinder-.name: Can I get the short version, please?

0626234604000729-SoulBinder-.name: No, the answer is clear. It's just that the road to get there is... less clear. We're going to face many hardships if we do this, and I'm not entirely sure we're ready for them.

0716001104000858-SoulBinder-.name: That's just it, I don't know. This plan... Well, let me just tell you what we're going to do. What we have to do. And then maybe it'll make sense. First, we need to go to $map:02000001$.

0716001104000860-SoulBinder-.name: Do you remember what $npcName:11001559[gender:0]$ and the master said? They spoke of a divine power that once passed to each Munakra. As far as I know, this power took the form of a sacred relic.

0716001104000861-SoulBinder-.name: At some point, that relic was lost. Apparently the only information we have about it was passed verbally from Munakra to Munakra. And without the master...

0716001104000862-SoulBinder-.name: So do you think the sacred relic is in $map:02000001$?

0716001104000863-SoulBinder-.name: No, but I think we may find a lead in $map:02000001$. $map:02000001$ is the heart of the great Alliance, a coalition of heroes and mystics formed to protect the world. I've heard they've found and safeguarded all kinds of relics, so even if they don't have ours, they might have a way to find it.

0716001104000864-SoulBinder-.name: I also think it's high time that Guidance rejoined the rest of the world. Isolated as we were out here made us an easy target for Kandura. I know $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ won't be happy about it, but in $map:02000001$ we can find new allies, new resources... maybe even new students.

0716001104000865-SoulBinder-.name: We can suss out the details when we get there. Right now, we need to get moving. I'll need a little time to plan our route, so check in with $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ and see if he needs anything.

0720004404000910-SoulBinder-.name: This really isn't the time for shortcuts. Are you sure you don't want to listen?

0720004404000912-SoulBinder-.name: I'm sure. We need actions, not words.

0719224504000887-SoulBinder-.name: Fine, I won't force you. Talk to $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ while I plan our next move.

0626234604000730-SoulBinder-.name: We can suss out the details later. Right now, we need to get moving. I'll need a little time to plan our route, so check in with $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ and see if he needs anything.

0626234604000731-SoulBinder-.name: Control your rage and find your center... That's what the master always taught me. That's what I must never forget...

0626234604000733-SoulBinder-.name: $npcName:11001558[gender:1]$... She's planning to take us to $map:02000001$. How can she do that?

0716001104000867-SoulBinder-.name: I just... I can't see the humans offering us any kind of aid. But I suppose she's considered this more carefully than I have.

0716001104000869-SoulBinder-.name: ...Yes. She is one of the most intelligent beings I know. In her eyes I see that spark of understanding, that glimmer that means she's ten steps ahead of wherever I am. $npcName:11001558[gender:1]$ has always been better at seeing the big picture than myself.

0716001104000871-SoulBinder-.name: Hm. I've always been hard on her. You know that. Because as brilliant as she is, she barely has the drive to use it.

0716001104000872-SoulBinder-.name: With you, I just don't like you. But with her... I want her to use that genius she has. I want to see her excel.

0716001104000873-SoulBinder-.name: She could be the greatest mind that Guidance has ever seen. I fully believe she could reach enlightenment if she only applied herself...

0716001104000874-SoulBinder-.name: ...And maybe I'm jealous of that. Maybe that's really why I'm so hard on her.

0716001104000875-SoulBinder-.name: You know, I have no idea why I told you all of that. I suppose today has been far harder on me than I ever expected. But if you breathe a word of this to her, I think you can imagine what would happen. Right?

0720004404000913-SoulBinder-.name: Oh, I suppose you're fine with $npcName:11001656[gender:1]$'s plan, then? I'm not surprised... why would you care about my opinion...

0720004404000914-SoulBinder-.name: That's not what I meant. Tell me what you're thinking.

0720004404000915-SoulBinder-.name: We don't have time for this fussing.

0719224504000889-SoulBinder-.name: ...As you say. $npcName:11001656[gender:1]$ has made her decision, and I've decided to accept it. For now.

0626234604000734-SoulBinder-.name: We should hurry before more trouble comes our way. Are you ready to leave?

0626234604000736-SoulBinder-.name: Good. There's nothing left for us here.

0626234604000737-SoulBinder-.name: Good. There's nothing left for us here.

0621181404001352-SoulBinder-.name: ...Well, I should have known travel by cloud wouldn't be very reliable. This town it evaporated over isn't what I imagined $map:02000001$ to look like.

0621181404001354-SoulBinder-.name: No. I can't do that to myself. I've got a mission, to head to $map:02000001$ as $npcName:11001558[gender:1]$ said. My next steps will become clear there.

0621181404001355-SoulBinder-.name: I'm a disciple of Guidance, same as them. I can't always rely on others. This time, I have to do this myself.

0621181404001356-SoulBinder-.name: Hello there! Are you one of the mercenaries contracted to escort the caravan?

0621181404001357-SoulBinder-.name: No, I'm just trying to get to $map:02000001$.

0621181404001358-SoulBinder-.name: Oh! Well, the caravan is headed to $map:02000001$. If you join the guard detail, you'll get where you want to go and provide a valuable service while you're at it!

0621181404001360-SoulBinder-.name: Great! The more people we have, the safer we'll feel.

0627165304000741-Striker-.name: I admit, it must have taken chops to get these back but... I have a hard time believing you've got what it takes to take on the champion of $map:63000020$.

0627165304000743-Striker-.name: $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$? He's a beast! There's no other way to put it. I've seen him tenderize guys twice his size like raw steaks.

0627165304000744-Striker-.name: Has anyone ever come close to beating him?

0627165304000745-Striker-.name: Well, there was one fight that wasn't absolutely one-sided. Some weird bird guy—Jun-something. He's the only person who's ever managed to hold his own against the Champ. He went off somewhere and we haven't seen him since. But if there's anybody who could give the Champ a fair fight now, it'd be the Gray Wolf.

0627165304000747-Striker-.name: ...Are you kidding me? I'm talking about you, dummy. I don't believe this...

0627165304000748-Striker-.name:
<font color="#909090">(His walkie-talkie crackles, and he picks it up with a look of disgust.)</font>
This better be urgent. Uh huh? Uh huh. One sec... Hey, I've gotta take this call. Give me a minute, will you?

0627165304000749-Striker-.name:
<font color="#909090">(His walkie-talkie crackles, and he picks it up with a look of disgust.)</font>
This better be urgent. Uh huh? Uh huh. One sec... Hey, I've gotta take this call. Give me a minute, will you?

0627165304000750-Striker-.name: Sigh, somebody always needs me for something! It's a crime to be this talented, I tell ya. This place wouldn't run without me. As for you, no matter how I look at you, I just see some scrawny dope. How could you be the Gray Wolf, scourge of the streets? I guess the rumors are just that, rumors.

0627165304000752-Striker-.name: Oh, there's all kinds of stories. They're all nonsense. But there's one that was reaaally absurd. It was about a showdown in $map:02000138$.

0627165304000753-Striker-.name: There were some gold bars that were misplaced during transportation, so the boss dispatched a team to retrieve them. Long story short, the residents of $map:02000138$ were awful keen on keeping the boss's gold, and surprise, surprise, they got hurt.

0627165304000754-Striker-.name: Then some $male:guy,female:lady$ shows up out of nowhere and roughs up our men real good. So the boss decides to make an example of $map:02000138$ and this "Gray Wolf" protecting the town. He sends more than a hundred guys to teach that do-gooder a lesson $male:he'd,female:she'd$ never forget.

0627165304000756-Striker-.name: And here's the craziest part of the story! They say you sent the lot of them—some 100 men—straight to the hospital! And supposedly the whole fight was over in an hour?! Ridiculous, right?

0627165304000758-Striker-.name: Right? I knew it was a load of bull.

0628000304000760-Striker-.name:
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001545[gender:0]$ shakes his head and mutters.)</font>
I don't believe it... There's no way that's $male:him,female:her$.

0702183804000763-Striker-.name:
Don't kid yourself about being a big shot here just because you were a big fish in $map:02000100$.
You're gonna need more than that if you want to make it here!

0702183804000764-Striker-.name:
I've just received an order from the boss to help you get stronger.
It's almost as if he doesn't think you have the stuff.
I've got some important info to share, so listen closely!

0702183804000765-Striker-.name:
Those with real power train without getting full of themselves.
I'm going to show you how to get stronger.
And you're going to do it by <font color="#ffd200">upgrading your skills</font>!

0702183804000766-Striker-.name:
You need materials to <font color="#ffd200">upgrade skills</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material there is.
The material type and amount required for upgrading varies by skill.

0702183804000767-Striker-.name:
You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, which are easy to find.
Finding other materials, however, won't be so easy.
I've heard you can occasionally get them by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.

0702183804000768-Striker-.name:
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill!
Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials!

0702183804000769-Striker-.name:
Feel like all this dust is damaging my lungs...
Should quickly finish the talk and go get some fresh air.

0702183804000770-Striker-.name:
Diligently upgrading your skills?
Boss must think your skills are lame,
because he told me to show you how to get stronger.

0702183804000771-Striker-.name:
In order to upgrade the skill above the average level,
you will not only need $item:40100001$, but also <font color="#ffd200">a special crystal</font>.

0702183804000772-Striker-.name:
It is similar to <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>, but it is not easy to find.
It can only be earned by <font color="#ffd200">defeating elite or boss monsters</font>.

0702183804000773-Striker-.name: First, I will give you <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font>, so use it to <font color="#ffd200">upgrade active skills</font>.

0727164304000920-SoulBinder-.name:
$MyPCName$!  
You know that <font color="#ffd200">Brother $npcName:11001716$</font> hates those who are lazy, right?
That's why I called you. Although it's a bit cumbersome, I'm sure I'll get in trouble if I don't take care of you...

0727164304000921-SoulBinder-.name:
Knowing this will help you get even stronger!
It's very important, so listen carefully!

0727164304000922-SoulBinder-.name:
Have you heard about <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>?
It makes the skills you can use even more powerful.
This means that the same skill can be even more effective!

0727164304000923-SoulBinder-.name:
You need materials to <font color="#ffd200">upgrade skills</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material you can use.
The type of material and the amount you need to upgrade varies by skill.

0727164304000924-SoulBinder-.name:
You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find.
But it's not so easy to find out where to get the other materials.
Rumors say that they are sometimes dropped after defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.

0727164304000925-SoulBinder-.name:
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill!
Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials!

0727164304000926-SoulBinder-.name:
Tired from all the investigating?
Just remember, you can't be lazy with your work. Brother $npcName:11001716$ is always watching.
He seems to keep track of our every breath. Maybe he's clairvoyant...

0727164304000927-SoulBinder-.name:
Brother $npcName:11001716$ said that you, $MyPCName$, have to get better at reconnaissance, scouting, mission planning...
As a result, he told me how you could get even stronger.
And although he looks like he only cares about the mission, there is a gentler side to him.

0727164304000928-SoulBinder-.name:
In order to upgrade the skill above the average level,
you will not only need $item:40100001$, but also <font color="#ffd200">a special crystal</font>.

0727164304000929-SoulBinder-.name:
It's similar to <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$,$item:40100021$</font>, but it is difficult to find.
It can only be earned by <font color="#ffd200">defeating an elite or boss monster</font>.

0727164304000930-SoulBinder-.name: First, I will give you <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font>, so use it for an <font color="#ffd200">active skill upgrade</font>.

1023200804000939-ContentsGuide01-.name: Oh my, another customer! I'm surprised you found your way to this little island.

1115231204001087-ContentsGuide01-.name: There's no better way to relax than to cast your line while drinking in the scent of the ocean... Anyhow, welcome. Seems like this is your first time around here. Allow me to give you this fishing rod as a gift. It may be a little worn in, but it'll reel them in fine!

1115231204001088-ContentsGuide01-.name: So many fish biting today, all you've gotta do is cast your line. What are you waiting for? Get that line in some water!

1023200804000940-ContentsGuide01-.name: What's wrong? Are the fish not biting?

1115231204001089-ContentsGuide01-.name: I don't own a fishing pole.

1115231204001090-ContentsGuide01-.name: I'm just stopping to take a breather.

1115231204001091-ContentsGuide01-.name: Listen $male:friend,female:little lady$, I like you plenty, but I'm not exactly swimming in spare gear over here. If you really don't got any fishing tackle, I'd be happy to sell you some.

1115231204001092-ContentsGuide01-.name: Ah, I see. Can't say I blame you! Heck of a sight, isn't it? Stay as long as you like.

1023200804000941-ContentsGuide01-.name: Well, what do you think? Satisfying, isn't it?

1115231204001093-ContentsGuide01-.name: Say that you do not have the <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000342$</font> bait.

1115231204001094-ContentsGuide01-.name: Say that you are just resting for a bit.

1115231204001097-ContentsGuide01-.name: Say that you do not have a fishing pole.

1115231204001098-ContentsGuide01-.name: Say that you are just resting for a bit.

1115231204001101-ContentsGuide01-.name: Say that you do not have a new fishing pole.

1115231204001102-ContentsGuide01-.name: Say that you are just resting for a bit.

1023200804000951-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hm... I just can't figure it out...

1115231204001106-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Is something wrong...? Take a look around.
Can't you see the murky water full of algae?
Some time ago, the water started to become polluted. Now it's all that way. Sigh...

1115231204001107-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Since then, the number of fishermen who visit the area has noticeably decreased...
I was also debating whether to leave or not. That's when... 
I saw a peculiar thing in the muddy water that I have never seen before.

1115231204001108-ContentsGuide01-.name:
I'm still here because a part of me is determined to catch that peculiar thing
and find out what exactly it is.
Aren't you curious as well? What could it be...
Won't you try and catch it with me?

1023200804000952-ContentsGuide01-.name: Why are you standing there like that?

1115231204001109-ContentsGuide01-.name: I don't have any fishing stuff.

1115231204001110-ContentsGuide01-.name: I'm just resting for a bit.

1115231204001111-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Yeah? Is that so?
I didn't pick my money off a tree, so I can't give you another one for free...
But if you need one, you can purchase it at production cost. Heh...

1115231204001112-ContentsGuide01-.name:
The place isn't even worth looking at anymore...
Just go and fish.

1023200804000953-ContentsGuide01-.name:
A <font color="#ffd200">Shrubberpuff</font>?
What a strange looking thing... I wonder if it always looked like this.

1115231204001115-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Uhhh...  How are you speaking so calmly about what just happened?
A volcano exploded and we barely escaped with our lives!
Are you so in shock that you don't have a sense of the situation?

1115231204001116-ContentsGuide01-.name: Yeah, I'm pretty used to this kinda thing.

1115231204001117-ContentsGuide01-.name: <font color="#909090">(Takes a look around.)</font> Ask if this is heaven.

1115231204001118-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Huh... Seems like you're not a normal fisherman...
The lava was overflowing when the volcano exploded and you didn't even blink...

1115231204001120-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Haha... Well, you are...
<font color="#909090">(Appears shocked while looking towards the lava canal.)</font> What… What is that!

1115231204001122-ContentsGuide01-.name:
J-Just now... Something came out of the lava and went back in!
Here... There is something in here as well!

1115231204001123-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Look here, <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>!
Look and see what's inside the lava! ...Yeah?

1115231204001124-ContentsGuide01-.name:
I am fine.
What about you? Are you okay?

1115231204001125-ContentsGuide01-.name: Yeah, I'm pretty used to this kinda thing.

1115231204001126-ContentsGuide01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(Shakes head left and right.)</font> You must have experienced a lot of shock...
<font color="#909090">(Appears shocked while looking towards the lava canal.)</font> Huh…? W-What is that!

1023200804000955-ContentsGuide01-.name:
What's wrong? 
Worried the volcano will erupt again?

1115231204001128-ContentsGuide01-.name: I don't have any fishing stuff.

1115231204001129-ContentsGuide01-.name: Respond by saying you're the type of person who would bathe in lava if you had to.

1115231204001130-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Is that so? 
Well I didn't pick my money from a tree, so I can't give you another one for free...
Luckily I was holding some of my equipment and therefore can spare a few to sell.
You're free to purchase some from me.

1115231204001131-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Sigh... I didn't imagine you as a bluffer.
Stop blabbing. If you aren't afraid, hurry and cast your fishing pole!

1023200804000956-ContentsGuide01-.name:
What... What's this! 
How hideous! A flaming fish... My goodness!

1115231204001132-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Let us hurry out of here!
We should get to an expert and ask about this enormous thing!

1023200804000957-ContentsGuide01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(He looks you up and down.)</font>
Hmm? Are you here for the audition?

1116171904001133-ContentsGuide01-.name: I'd like to learn how to play an instrument.

1116171904001134-ContentsGuide01-.name: Sorry, but class is not in session. These are the auditions for the Moonlight Ensemble, which will be performing soon.

1116171904001135-ContentsGuide01-.name: Okay. I'm here for that, then.

1116171904001136-ContentsGuide01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(He strokes his chin and ponders silently, looking worried.)</font> 
Hmm... Well... Do you have any experience? Music isn't something someone can teach you with just a few words.

1116171904001137-ContentsGuide01-.name: Don't look so disappointed... I'll loan you this instrument and music sheet to experiment with. You can practice on your own time.

1023200804000958-ContentsGuide01-.name: Ah... Did you want to ask me something?

1116171904001138-ContentsGuide01-.name: I don't have what I need to play.

1116171904001139-ContentsGuide01-.name: I want to play in the Ensemble!

1116171904001140-ContentsGuide01-.name: I thought I'd given you everything you might need, but it seems not. Oh well. You can always buy instruments and scores from $npcName:11001865[gender:0]$.

1116171904001141-ContentsGuide01-.name: You will perform in the Moonlight Ensemble when I say you are ready, and not a moment sooner! Ah... Ahem. Excuse me. What I meant to say was... Keep practicing, and you will be on the stage in no time!

1023200804000959-ContentsGuide01-.name: You're a little rough around the edges... But I'll be darned if there isn't a spark in you... What did you say your name was?

1116171904001143-ContentsGuide01-.name: $MyPCName$...? I'll remember that. If you give it all you've got, eat your veggies, and practice every day, I think you just might have what it takes.

1023200804000960-ContentsGuide01-.name: Have you been practicing your instrument?

1116171904001144-ContentsGuide01-.name: Boast that others may lose their hearing due to your tremendous skill.

1116171904001145-ContentsGuide01-.name: Say that performing isn't very fun.

1116171904001146-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Ha hah! Your confidence is overflowing!
It's good to see you're enjoying music.
Have you considered trying a different instrument?
I will give an instrument as a gift.

1116171904001147-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Oh my...
It would be such a waste of your natural talent to give up like this... Hmm...
Have you considered trying a different instrument? I'll give you one as a gift.

1023200804000961-ContentsGuide01-.name: Ah... Did you have any questions...?

1116171904001148-ContentsGuide01-.name: Say that you want to perform, but you don't have the tools.

1116171904001149-ContentsGuide01-.name: Say that you want to participate in the ensemble.

1116171904001150-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Ah... Is that so?
Actually, $npc:11001865$ has come to sell new products to the people auditioning. 
Go and purchase the instrument and music score you need.

1116171904001151-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Ah... Is that so?
There is still plenty of time before the ensemble performance, so it isn't impossible if you start practicing right away.
Put in the effort, and you can accomplish anything.

1023200804000962-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Of course... You're a natural, just as expected.
I hope you don't let your musical talents go to waste!

1116171904001153-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Right now it's time for the <font color="#ffd200">Moonlight Ensemble</font> to begin...
But we can't seem to get in contact with our piano player.

1116171904001154-ContentsGuide01-.name: Ask when the ensemble audition was.

1116171904001155-ContentsGuide01-.name:
It was a few days ago... Did you not hear about it?
When you didn't show up I was disappointed. I thought that you, <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>,
had lost interest in performing... Woe was me...

1116171904001156-ContentsGuide01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(Realizes something...)</font> 
Ah! Of course!
If you had participated in the audition, the piano performance would have been yours!
There is no one who compares to your level of talent!

1116171904001157-ContentsGuide01-.name:
<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>!
Please play the piano for the ensemble.
Though it is a new piece...with your talent, I'm sure you will be able to perform it amazingly!

1023200804000964-ContentsGuide01-.name:
<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>!
Please play the piano for this ensemble.
Though it's a new piece, with your talent I'm sure you can perform it amazingly!

1023200804000965-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Bravo! Bravo!
That was an amazing performance!

1116171904001158-ContentsGuide01-.name:
I only heard the news just after the performance started.
The piano player had a severe stomachache and couldn't make it.

1116171904001159-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Anyways, thanks to $MyPCName$, the performance was a success.
The next time there is an ensemble, earn your way in through an audition.
I'm sure I'll see you soon!

1023200804000966-ContentsGuide01-.name: Judging from those clothes, you've obviously never been here before. Welcome. I'm sure we've got something to elevate your fashion.

1117023004001160-ContentsGuide01-.name: I don't see anything that's really "me" here.

1117023004001161-ContentsGuide01-.name: There's no accounting for taste. Have you any idea how much love and care goes into each of my pieces?

1117023004001162-ContentsGuide01-.name: I bet I could do better!

1117023004001163-ContentsGuide01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(She scoffs at you.)</font>
Is that confidence I hear? Or arrogance? Fine, I'll humor you. There's nothing I enjoy more than watching the fashion-impaired make fools of themselves.

1023200804000967-ContentsGuide01-.name: You simply can't design anything without a fashion template. If you're determined to embarrass yourself, you can buy one at the workshop. You know, the little button on the bottom-right corner of your screen?

1023200804000968-ContentsGuide01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(For the briefest moment, her eyes widen.)</font>
That... Hm. That isn't half-bad.

1023200804000969-ContentsGuide01-.name: This design looks perfectly adequate... at a glance. But how does it hang off the body? Does it even fit you properly? No, no, the true test of a designer is on the runway. Put this on and I will show you what I mean.

1023200804000970-ContentsGuide01-.name: Have you lost your nerve? Very well. I shall accept your defeat.

1023200804000971-ContentsGuide01-.name: Well... It fit you... because you're the one who made it. That's the only reason that outfit looks even half-passable on you.

1023200804000972-ContentsGuide01-.name: You insist on playing at fashion design? Fine. Even I have to admit that you have some small, small kernel of talent.

1117023004001164-ContentsGuide01-.name: Allow me to introduce you to the League of Fashionistas. But first, I insist that you take a new profile picture to show off your outfit. We don't want to make a bad first impression, now, do we?

1023200804000973-ContentsGuide01-.name: Allow me to introduce you to the League of Fashionistas. But first, I insist that you take a new profile picture to show off your new outfit. We don't want to make a bad first impression, now, do we?

1023200804000974-ContentsGuide01-.name: Ha. You look better in photographs than you do in real life. Perhaps... perhaps we could work together, after all.

1023200804000981-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hey! It's $MyPCName$! Don't say a word, you beautiful dummy. I know exactly what you're here for.

1117023004001166-ContentsGuide01-.name: There's no need to get flustered. I'll teach you the basics. First, take these materials. Let's try making something simple!

1023200804000982-ContentsGuide01-.name: What was what? Is there a problem?

1117023004001168-ContentsGuide01-.name: What's the deal with this place?

1117023004001169-ContentsGuide01-.name: What!? How could you lose them? Did you think because I gave them to you for free, that they were worthless, and safe to throw out? Well I've got news for you, $male:mister,female:lady$. From now on, you're paying for your own materials.

1117023004001170-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hmm? You don't know? It's a handicraft workshop. Aren't you here to learn how to handicraft?

1117023004001171-ContentsGuide01-.name: Actually, I was just sort of wandering around.

1117023004001172-ContentsGuide01-.name: What? (Her eyebrow twitches with subdued rage.)

1117023004001173-ContentsGuide01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(She clears her throat, then smiles.)</font>
No matter! What's important is that you are here. What you learn today will be just as useful tomorrow.

1023200804000983-ContentsGuide01-.name: A ring! Wow! You shouldn't have. I think you deserve another lesson.

1023200804000984-ContentsGuide01-.name: Your timing is perfect. I could use a hand!

1117023004001176-ContentsGuide01-.name: I came to gather materials for a special order that just came into the shop. I have no problem getting my hands dirty, but I can only mine so much on my own!

1117023004001177-ContentsGuide01-.name: There's a material found primarily here in $map:63000046$ known as $item:33000023$. I need a lot of it. How would you like to help me mine them? You'll be rewarded, of course.

1023200804000985-ContentsGuide01-.name: There's a material found primarily here in $map:63000046$ known as $itemPlural:33000023$. I need a large number of them. How would you like to help me mine them? You'll be rewarded, of course.

1023200804000986-ContentsGuide01-.name: Thank you so much for your help! You should swing by the workshop again some time. I'll teach you all about handicrafting!

1023200804000990-ContentsGuide01-.name: Oh my! Where has the time gone? $MyPCName$, I'd love to teach you more of my wondrous handicraft techniques... But I'm afraid I have an appointment to make.

1117023004001179-ContentsGuide01-.name: My older sister is a famous blacksmith at $map:02000203$. I was on my way to ask her to enchant one of my items when you stopped by...

1023200804000991-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hey, this is a great chance for you to try enchanting something. I could sell you something to enchant, if you want!

1023200804000992-ContentsGuide01-.name: Well? What do you think? It's only been enchanted once, but it looks good, right?

1023200804000993-ContentsGuide01-.name: Anyway, we can't stop here. Let's enchant something else!

1023200804000994-ContentsGuide01-.name: Anyway, we can't stop here. Let's enchant something else!

1023200804000995-ContentsGuide01-.name: Not bad, huh? You know, this place isn't half bad. I should move the forge here! Ha!

1117023004001180-ContentsGuide01-.name: Ask the reason for being here.

1117023004001181-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Why, what other reason do I have to leave the workshop and come here?
I'm here to grab reforging materials, of course.
This time I came to get a special material needed to decorate a piece of my own handiwork.

1117023004001182-ContentsGuide01-.name:
$map:63000046$ isn't very big; however, geographically, there is a variety of soil.
In $map:02000076$ it can be difficult to purchase materials only found in <font color="#ffd200">deep forests like $map:02000023$</font> 
and <font color="#ffd200">beaches like $map:02000062$</font>. Even for a premium...

1117023004001183-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Luckily, although there isn't much variety here, 
you can purchase materials that can't be easily found in the $map:02000076$ meadow.
<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>, won't you help me find the materials? At least for the sake of experience?

1023200804000997-ContentsGuide01-.name:
If you go <font color="#ffd200">downward</font>, you''ll come across a <font color="#ffd200">small forest</font> containing a mysterious energy. Further down you'll find a <font color="#ffd200">cozy little beach</font>.
Will you collect <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000024$</font> in the forest and <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000025$</font> on the beach for me?

1023200804000998-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Wow! Thank you very much. 
You have helped me countless times...

1023200804000999-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Hmm... I can't leave the workshop empty for so long. 
That would be quite a problem.

1117023004001184-ContentsGuide01-.name: Ask if there is any reason to not return to the workshop.

1117023004001185-ContentsGuide01-.name:
The thing is...I have received more reforging orders than I can handle. I do not have enough materials.
To meet the requests, I'll need to gather a lot more materials, and quickly.
<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>, think you have it in you to help me again?

1023200804001000-ContentsGuide01-.name:
The thing is...I have received more reforging orders than I can handle. I do not have enough materials.
To meet the requests, I'll need to gather a lot more materials, and quickly.
<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>, think you have it in you to help me again?

1023200804001001-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Is it too difficult? 
Ha... At this speed, nothing will get done.

1023200804001002-ContentsGuide01-.name:
This won't do.
$MyPCName$, I will stay here and continue mining. Will you go to <font color="#ffd200">Nerman Barn</font> on the <font color="#ffd200">eastern side of the mine</font> and ask if <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001870$</font> has any <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000343$</font>? 
If so, please bring some back.

1023200804001003-ContentsGuide01-.name:
$MyPCName$, I will stay here and continue mining. Will you go to <font color="#ffd200">Nerman Barn</font> on the <font color="#ffd200">eastern side of the mine</font> and ask if <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001870$</font> has any <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000343$</font>? 
If so, please bring some back.

1023200804001004-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Huhuh. Look here, young friend!
Be careful, for there is cow poop scattered about like landmines. Huhuhuh.

1023200804001005-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Okay, young friend.
What is the reason you have passed through the cow poop to be here?

1117023004001187-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Haha, what's there to do?
There aren't any left... Our only choice is to make more...

1117023004001188-ContentsGuide01-.name: Say that materials will need gathered before they can be made.

1117023004001189-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Hmm, so materials need to be gathered...
See the cows at that barn? Go and bring back a few <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000041$</font>.
If you have raised livestock at your home before, you will find this to be similar.

1023200804001006-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Hmm, if that's the case materials need to be gathered.
See the cows at that barn? Go and bring back a few <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000041$</font>.
If you have raised livestock at your home before, you will find this to be similar.

1023200804001007-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Not that difficult, huh?
They need to get haircuts every once in a while, but it's for their own good.

1023200804001008-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Now it's time to take <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000041$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">create</font> <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000343$</font>.
It isn't difficult. Give it a try.

1023200804001009-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Now it's time to take <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000041$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">create</font> <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000343$</font>.
It isn't difficult. Give it a try.

1023200804001010-ContentsGuide01-.name: Ah, you have finally arrived. I've been waiting!

1117023004001191-ContentsGuide01-.name:
You see... The truth is after $MyPCName$ went to the barn, a passing guild member handed me the $item:20000343$ they had with them.
Thanks to that generous passerby, I was able to collect this much material in a short amount of time.

1117023004001192-ContentsGuide01-.name:
You have worked hard; however, this is how it turned out...
You can take that $item:20000343$ and use it as needed.

1023200804001011-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Ah! $MyPCName$. 
That $item:20000343$, how about trying it out here?
You will be able to feel your mining speed increase immensely.

1023200804001012-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Ah! $MyPCName$. 
That $item:20000343$, how about trying it out here?
You will be able to feel your mining speed increase immensely.

1023200804001013-ContentsGuide01-.name:
What you think? Makes mining much easier, right?
I didn't decide to build a barn and raise cattle by this mine for no reason. Ha!

1117023004001193-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Hey...$MyPCName$.
What are you going to do with the <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000023$</font>?
If you don't have a specific use for it...maybe you can sell it to me? I will give you a fair price.

1117023004001196-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Wow! <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>, you're the best!
Thank you so much!

1117023004001197-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Look, I really need this... Please help me out one more time.
I will buy it at a really good price. Please?

1117023004001198-ContentsGuide01-.name: Nod yes as if there's no other choice.

1023200804001014-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hey, you with the face! Are you here to participate in the rally, or just to watch?

1110111004001055-ContentsGuide01-.name: Is that so? Good, good! Well, unless you're planning to race on foot, you're going to need a vehicle.  How would you like to burn rubber in my brand new, souped-up super car? It hardly ever explodes anymore. What do you say?

1110111004001056-ContentsGuide01-.name: Listen, I'd drive it myself if I could... But let's face it, I'm old. I could break a hip if I fall out of bed. To think what the G-force of speeding down the raceway would do to my bones... All I can picture is a crushed bag of chips.

1110111004001057-ContentsGuide01-.name: What do you say, kiddo? Won't you test my magnificent, high-tech super-engine? Once you start racing, you'll feel it: the need for speed coursing through your veins! Just, uhh... keep that gauge there out of the red. <font size="20">You know, experimental radioactive fuel and all.</font>

1110111004001058-ContentsGuide01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(He sighs.)</font>
How could you come all this way just to watch? Wouldn't you rather race? You could be burning rubber in my new souped-up super car! It hardly ever explodes anymore. What do you say?

1110111004001059-ContentsGuide01-.name: Listen, I'd drive it myself if I could... But let's face it, I'm old. I could break a hip if I fall out of bed. To think what the G-force of speeding down the raceway would do to my bones... All I can picture is a crushed bag of chips.

1110111004001060-ContentsGuide01-.name: What do you say, kiddo? Won't you test my magnificent, high-tech super-engine? Once you start racing, you'll feel it: the need for speed coursing through your veins! Just, uhh... keep that gauge there out of the red. <font size="20">You know, experimental radioactive fuel and all.</font>

1023200804001015-ContentsGuide01-.name: Go, go... Keep it up! Just don't go TOO fast. You wouldn't want what's in that engine overheating, trust me. Moderation is key.

1110111004001061-ContentsGuide01-.name: Don't get mad but I, uhh, lost your car...

1110111004001062-ContentsGuide01-.name: Don't worry, pops. I've got this race in the bag.

1110111004001063-ContentsGuide01-.name: Y-you... lost my car!? Do you have ANY idea how many hours, how many mesos I spent...

1110111004001064-ContentsGuide01-.name: There's the research and development costs, my assistant's monthly salary, hush money for my previous assistant's family... I'm not made of mesos, you know! The best I can do is sell you a new car at cost. If you're interested, perhaps we can make a trade.

1110111004001065-ContentsGuide01-.name: Excellent! And if you manage to adequately test the performance of my engine, you can keep that prototype super-car. How do you like them apples?

1023200804001016-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hahaha, yes! The car made it through the lap without so much as a mild explosion! Well, what do you think? How did it feel to be speeding along, listening to the roar of the engine with the wind whipping through your hair?

1110111004001067-ContentsGuide01-.name: To be honest, I've driven more impressive super-cars.

1110111004001068-ContentsGuide01-.name: It seems the reactor is stable after all. I'd like you to keep the prototype as thanks for your help. You shouldn't need to swap fuel rods for the next century or so. They're a bit radioactive, but, uhh... you weren't planning on procreating, right?

1110111004001069-ContentsGuide01-.name:
R-really? To fail after having worked so hard... Alas... I suppose there's no point in returning the car...
<font color="#909090">(He lowers his head in disappointment.)</font>

1023200804001017-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hm? Oh goodness, it's you! You're the young adventurer who helped me stress-test my race car super-engine before!

1110133904001072-ContentsGuide01-.name: What a pleasant surprise! Are you still driving that car I gave you?

1110133904001074-ContentsGuide01-.name: Actually, I've moved on to shinier, fancier vehicles.

1110133904001075-ContentsGuide01-.name: Oh, is that so? Still cruising around with your wheels on the ground, eh? Hahaha... Well then, you've come at the perfect time! What would you say to the chance to rule the skies?

1110133904001076-ContentsGuide01-.name: Pending the results of a lawsuit, I've taken a break from my engine research and started looking into making flight more accessible to all. This is my first invention, a $item:40400001$. I believe I've perfectly counterbalanced the balloons for your weight, so you should be able to soar the skies without getting lost in the stratosphere. Give it a try!

1110133904001077-ContentsGuide01-.name: Ah, is that so? Already on to a new and exciting mode of transport? Hahaha... Well, what would you say if I offered you an opportunity to slip the surly bonds of the earth entirely? Oh no, not death... I mean flight of course!

1110133904001078-ContentsGuide01-.name: Pending the results of a lawsuit, I've taken a break from my engine research and started looking into making flight more accessible to all. This is my first invention, a $item:40400001$. I believe I've perfectly counterbalanced the balloons for your weight, so you should be able to soar the skies without getting lost in the stratosphere. Give it a try!

1023200804001018-ContentsGuide01-.name: All you have to do is grab on tight to this balloon, and you'll float away! Follow the rainbow and fly to that other building way over there.

1110133904001079-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hey, uhh... That wasn't the only balloon you made, right?

1110133904001080-ContentsGuide01-.name: Do you have something else I can fly in?

1110133904001081-ContentsGuide01-.name: Well of course I made more than one, any good scienti— Hey, wait a second! Did you lose my balloon? Sigh... Well, there's no use being angry. You can purchase another from $npcName:11001875[gender:1]$ for a marginal fee.

1110133904001082-ContentsGuide01-.name: Err... Well, I came here to test my $item:40400001$</font>, which is why I gave it to you... But ultimately you can fly with whatever vehicle strikes your fancy. Just look at the other people flying around the rainbow.

1023200804001019-ContentsGuide01-.name: Ahhh... Was this your first time flying?

1110133904001085-ContentsGuide01-.name: Well, you've demonstrated marvelous control... You're a natural aviator! I'll report the results of the test to Doctor $npcName:11001873[gender:0]$. Feel free to keep that $item:40400001$ as a souvenir. Really they're just store-bought balloons filled with an experimental gas.

1110133904001086-ContentsGuide01-.name: It shows! I'll tell $npcName:11001873[gender:0]$ how the test went. Feel free to keep that $item:40400001$. Really they're just store-bought balloons filled with an experimental gas.

1023200804001020-ContentsGuide01-.name: Ah! Perfect timing. As a complimentary service, Goldus Real Estate is providing our customers with interior design assistance.

1219155104001209-ContentsGuide01-.name: One of my dearest, trendiest friends will be coming by to help you with your interior design. I trust you'll give him a warm welcome.

0207142004001223-ContentsGuide01-.name: And here he is. I'm going to head back to the office... Good luck to the both of you!

0207142004001224-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hello there. $npc:11001876[gender:0]$'s the name, and interior design's my game! I'm here to help you make your house look amazing.

0207142004001225-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hm... Let's start with the basics, and take it step-by-step.

1023200804001021-ContentsGuide01-.name: If you head over to your home now, you'll discover one of our associates waiting eagerly to tutor you in the basics of interior design.

1023200804001022-ContentsGuide01-.name: Ah, very nice. You may just have an eye for this.

1117155004001199-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hmm... There must be a furnishing better suited to your home's aesthetic. Shall we pick one out together?

1023200804001023-ContentsGuide01-.name: You can purchase whatever you like, and it will be transported here auto-magically in an instant! Why don't you purchase a furnishing and see for yourself?

1023200804001024-ContentsGuide01-.name: You can purchase whatever you like, and it will be transported here auto-magically in an instant! Why don't you purchase a furnishing and see for yourself?

1023200804001025-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hmm… The vibe in here is definitely improving. I have to hand it to you, you do seem to have a sense for interior decorating.

1117155004001200-ContentsGuide01-.name: You can change the feel of a home drastically with the right furniture. Work hard to make your house a place you can be proud of!

1023200804001026-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hmm... The place is... looking a little drab...

1121193504001204-ContentsGuide01-.name: I'd like to give you a gift. It's a $item:50200299$. It's got a very practical and clean design, a nice starter-bed. Why don't you place it somewhere? It would really class up the place.

1023200804001027-ContentsGuide01-.name: I'd like to give you a gift. It's a $item:50200299$. It's got a very practical and clean design, a nice starter-bed. Why don't you place it somewhere? It would really class up the place.

1023200804001028-ContentsGuide01-.name: It's easy to tell a neglectful homeowner from a caring one by the care $male:he,female:she$ puts into decorating. There are certain furnishings which are especially good indicators of this, and thus, increase your home's decoration score. Take that $item:50200299$, for example.

1121193504001205-ContentsGuide01-.name: You may have noticed that the moment you placed $item:50200299$, your decoration score increased. Your decoration score is a representation of how any tasteful observer would assess your home.

1117155004001201-ContentsGuide01-.name: Decorate your home however you wish, but if you have any interest in maintaining a sensibly arranged home, you should pay attention to your decoration score.

1023200804001029-ContentsGuide01-.name: The atmosphere in here is all off. I know! How about a new table and sofa?

1023200804001030-ContentsGuide01-.name: This room... It's just not working.

1023200804001031-ContentsGuide01-.name: Swapping out a piece of furniture here and there can drastically change the ambiance of a home. It's far easier than changing the wallpaper, and just as satisfying.

1117155004001202-ContentsGuide01-.name: I have to admit, you're not half bad. Perhaps you don't need my help after all. Well, I'll be off then.

1023200804001032-ContentsGuide01-.name: Ah, hello...? Is anyone home? I brought over a little housewarming present. This cuddly little chickie is yours to raise.

1219160104001210-ContentsGuide01-.name: A little young to own a home aren't you? I like it! It shows forward thinking and dedication.

1219160104001211-ContentsGuide01-.name: My name's $npcName:11001877$ and I run the farm up the way. I was passing by when I couldn't help but peep through your windows and notice how empty your house looked! So, I thought I'd do the neighborly thing and bring you a housewarming gift. It's a chicken!

1219160104001212-ContentsGuide01-.name: Here, take it. If I had my way, there'd be a hen in every home! Really makes the place feel cozy. I hope you'll look after it.

1023200804001033-ContentsGuide01-.name: Here, take it. If I had my way, there'd be a hen in every home! Really makes the place feel cozy. I hope you'll look after it.

1023200804001034-ContentsGuide01-.name: I raised that there little gal ever since she hatched from her egg. Take good care of her!

1023200804001038-ContentsGuide01-.name: Look! The little chickie has something for you!

1023200804001039-ContentsGuide01-.name: Look! The little chickie has something for you!

1023200804001040-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hahahaha... What do you think? Caring for livestock is a lot of work, but it's worth it in the end.

1117155004001203-ContentsGuide01-.name: Take good care of that little birdie. And don't worry... I'll let myself in once in a while and see that she's fed and looked after. Well, see you next time!

1023200804001041-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Hey! Have you been well? The livestock is doing well?
Oh... The animal smell is too strong at the house, huh?
How about we go for something a little cleaner that requires less maintenance this time?

1023200804001042-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Hey! Have you been well?
The livestock is doing well too, you say?

1023200804001043-ContentsGuide01-.name:
They are a bit slow, and therefore more calm and quiet...
They are also low-maintenance, which makes them easier to raise. Good luck!

1023200804001047-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Have you been well? I have something great to pass on to you!
I heard that if you harvest $item:33000027$ with $item:20000350$, the efficiency is much higher. First, let's try to make one!

1023200804001048-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Have you been well? I have something great to pass on to you!
I heard that if you harvest $item:33000027$ with $item:20000350$, the efficiency is much higher. First, let's try to make one!

1023200804001049-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Wow! Your workmanship is excellent! Ha!
Now then, it's time to harvest $item:33000027$ with $item:20000350$!

1023200804001050-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Let us begin!
$item:33000027$ crumbles easily, so you need to be careful.

1023200804001051-ContentsGuide01-.name:
Let us begin!
$item:33000027$ crumbles easily, so you need to be careful.

1023200804001052-ContentsGuide01-.name:
How was it? Much more comfortable than with your bare hands, right?
Agriculture is a science, you know! Keep up the good work!

0106154704001213-ContentsGuide01-.name: Greetings! Welcome to the Guild Registry HQ. I'm the chairwoman of the registry, and I'm in charge of overseeing all guild-related activities in Maple World!

0106154704001214-ContentsGuide01-.name: $MyPCName$, have you joined a guild yet?

0106154704001215-ContentsGuide01-.name: I wouldn't join any guild that would have me as a member.

0106154704001216-ContentsGuide01-.name: Hmm... I guess I could apply to one of those.

0106154704001217-ContentsGuide01-.name: Don't be silly! Guilds are a wonderful place to meet new friends, and besides, you get benefits just for being a member!

0106154704001218-ContentsGuide01-.name: Just remember, if you can't find a guild you're interested in, you can always start your own!

0106154704001219-ContentsGuide01-.name: That's the spirit, $MyPCName$! In addition to friendship and comradery, you'll receive all kinds of benefits as a member of a guild! Just remember, if you can't find a guild you're interested in, you can always start your own!

0106154704001220-ContentsGuide01-.name: You can view information about your guild from the Guild window.

0106154704001221-ContentsGuide01-.name: $MyPCName$! How does it feel to be a part of something bigger than yourself? Seeking out and interacting with like-minded guild members is the key to a fun and happy Maple World for everyone!

0106154704001222-ContentsGuide01-.name: Here's to the continued success and growth of all guilds in Maple World! I hope I'll see you again real soon!

0223151404001226-ContentsGuide02-.name: Welcome to our garden. Here, we grow ancient and endangered herbs. Just breathe in that smell! Isn't it magical?

0308172604001265-ContentsGuide02-.name: Hm... Judging by that vacant stare, you weren't listening to my very important suggestion. Allow me to repeat myself. Go collect a flower from the garden and give it a good sniff! One hit will relax you, body and mind.

0223151404001227-ContentsGuide02-.name: Go collect a flower from the garden and give it a good sniff! One hit will relax you, body and mind.

0223151404001228-ContentsGuide02-.name: Ah, the subtle scent of the $item:33000166$. Lovely.

0223175804001244-ContentsGuide02-.name: Ah, now this is a nice home! Ahem. Please don't stare at me. It's rude to stare.

0308172604001286-ContentsGuide02-.name: My name is $npcName:11003142$, and I come bearing a gift from beyond the stars. I simply... had a good feeling about this house, so I decided to pop in.

0308172604001288-ContentsGuide02-.name: That is how we make new friends on my world. It takes time for people to grow close. Perhaps as long as it will take this rice seed to grow.

0308172604001289-ContentsGuide02-.name: Will you accept my gift? Will you nurture it and harvest it? If you do not want to, that's all right... I will simply return home.

0223175804001245-ContentsGuide02-.name: Will you accept my gift and nurture it?

0223175804001246-ContentsGuide02-.name: That is the perfect place for it.

0223175804001250-ContentsGuide02-.name: When the time comes, the rice must be harvested. Your dedication now will determine what you reap in the future.

0223175804001251-ContentsGuide02-.name: When the time comes, the rice must be harvested. Your dedication now will determine what you reap in the future.

0223175804001252-ContentsGuide02-.name: Ahh, that golden luster... It brings to mind the light of my world's star. I'm glad I came here to bring you this gift. It was the right choice.

0816160004001437-ContentsGuide03-.name: Hmm? Haven't you heard? Those hungry $item:61000002$ monsters can actually be tamed as pets.

0816160004001438-ContentsGuide03-.name: Why would I want a pet slime?

0816160004001439-ContentsGuide03-.name: You really don't know? Tamed pets not only enhance your attributes, but they'll fight by your side.

0816160004001440-ContentsGuide03-.name: How does one tame a monster?

0816160004001441-ContentsGuide03-.name: Well, you can't tame just any monster. It has to be a hungry one. $npc:11003507[gender:1]$ over there can tell you more.

0816160004001442-ContentsGuide03-.name: What are you still looking at me for? If you want to learn about monster taming, talk to $npc:11003507[gender:1]$ over there.

0816160004001443-ContentsGuide03-.name: You want to learn how to tame monsters? And why, may I ask, is that?

0816160004001445-ContentsGuide03-.name: I want to get an edge over my enemies in combat.

0816160004001446-ContentsGuide03-.name: So you're looking for a friend, eh? I can help you out with that. Let me know when you're ready to get down to business.

0816160004001447-ContentsGuide03-.name: That's all well and good, but you should know your pet won't fight your battles for you. Well then, let me know when you're ready to get down to business.

0816160004001448-ContentsGuide03-.name: Let's dive right in. You probably know that there's a brand of candy designed specifically for monster taste buds. What you may not know, is that it is key to taming them.

0816160004001449-ContentsGuide03-.name: Monster candy? Where can I get some?

0816160004001451-ContentsGuide03-.name: Lots of merchants sell it. It just so happens that I've already placed a special order with $npc:11003508[gender:1]$. I'll give you some of my candy if you pick up my order.

0816160004001452-ContentsGuide03-.name: Do you see $npc:11003508[gender:1]$ over there? You can pick up my order from that pile next to her. Be careful, it's kind of heavy.

0816160004001453-ContentsGuide03-.name: You brought it! Here, you can have these. Now that you have your candy, $npc:11003503[gender:0]$ can show you how monster taming works in practice.

0816160004001454-ContentsGuide03-.name: You want to learn how to tame monsters? Well, you're in the right place! There are plenty of hungry $itemPlural:61000002$ right over there. You brought some $itemPlural:63000000$, right?

0816160004001455-ContentsGuide03-.name: All right. The process is quite simple, actually. Just throw the candy at one of those hungry $itemPlural:61000002$. Keep feeding the monster, and it'll let down its guard and approach you.

0816160004001456-ContentsGuide03-.name: How will I know when it's working?

0816160004001457-ContentsGuide03-.name: Well that's easy. As you feed it candy, it will grow docile, and then a heart will appear above its head. And then, you strike! But that's a separate lesson. For now, just try feeding one of those $itemPlural:61000002$ until it lets you close.

0816234204001507-ContentsGuide03-.name: As you feed the monster, a bar will appear over its head indicating how comfortable it is with you. If the bar is yellow or red, it means you'll need to use more candy to pacify it, but it also means there's a chance the beast is a rare one.

0817000104001531-ContentsGuide03-.name: Where do I find those $itemPlural:61000002$ again?

0817000104001533-ContentsGuide03-.name: All this candy-throwing is too much work.

0817000104001534-ContentsGuide03-.name:
You're having trouble finding hungry $itemPlural:61000002$?
If you hunt the slimes nearby, it shouldn't be long before a hungry $item:61000002$ shows up.

0821231704001549-ContentsGuide03-.name: Isn't there anywhere else I can find them?

0821231704001550--.name: Somewhere besides $map:02000017$? Of course. If you look up the $item:61000002$ in the Pet Album, you can see the various habitats where it resides.

0817000104001535-ContentsGuide03-.name: You... didn't eat it all, did you? You buy more from $npc:11003506[gender:1]$ over there. Supply Merchants in major towns also sell the candy.

0817000104001536-ContentsGuide03-.name: If you haven't already, you should add the candy to a quickslot so you can use it more easily. Be sure to face the monster that you want to tame before you throw it. Easy, right?

0817000104001538-ContentsGuide03-.name: What's the deal with that bar over the monster's head?

0817000104001539-ContentsGuide03-.name: Yeah! Good luck! Let me know if you have any other questions.

0817000104001540-ContentsGuide03-.name: As you feed the monster, a bar will appear over its head indicating how comfortable it is with you. If the bar is yellow or red, it means you'll need to use more candy to calm it down, but it also means there's a chance the beast is a rare one.

0816160004001459-ContentsGuide03-.name: Now that you know how to pacify $itemPlural:61000002$, why don't you try capturing one? First, there's a tool you'll need to craft. $npc:11003507[gender:1]$ will show you how. You can use these materials.

0816160004001460-ContentsGuide03-.name: Ah, you want to craft a monster trap, do you? it looks like $npc:11003503[gender:0]$ gave you everything you need to put together a $item:63100000$.

0816160004001461-ContentsGuide03-.name: All you need to do to craft the $item:63100000$ is open the Life Skills window and navigate to Leisure > Pet Taming.

0816160004001462-ContentsGuide03-.name: The higher your Pet Taming mastery, the higher the grade of snares you can craft. Now, go see $npc:11003503[gender:0]$ to learn how to capture pets.

0816160004001464-ContentsGuide03-.name: Now, go capture yourself one of those $itemPlural:61000002$! You remember how to tame them, right?

0816160004001467-ContentsGuide03-.name: Okay. So once you've pacified the $item:61000002$ with delicious monster candy, it will follow you. The trick is to set your trap on the ground and lead the monster into it.

0816160004001468-ContentsGuide03-.name: That's how it works! But remember that if the monster isn't docile when it steps into the trap, it's not going to work. Now, go try capturing a $item:61000002$.

0816160004001469-ContentsGuide03-.name:
It's simple. You just throw candy at it until a heart appears over its head. 
Then, it's time to capture it!

0816160004001471-ContentsGuide03-.name: What would you like me to explain?

0816160004001472-ContentsGuide03-.name: How do I pacify a monster?

0816160004001473-ContentsGuide03-.name: How do I capture a pacified monster?

0816160004001474-ContentsGuide03-.name: How do I find hungry monsters?

0816160004001475-ContentsGuide03-.name:
It's simple. You just throw candy at it until a heart appears over its head. 
Then you know what to do next, right?

0816160004001477-ContentsGuide03-.name: Would you mind explaining one more time?

0816160004001478-ContentsGuide03-.name: You have to lead the monster over the trap while it's pacified. It won't work otherwise. Now, go try capturing a $item:61000002$.

0816160004001479-ContentsGuide03-.name: Good! Why don't you give it another go? Remember, you can't capture a monster until you've pacified it.

0816160004001480-ContentsGuide03-.name: You don't know where to find hungry monsters? Hungry monsters show up as blue dots on the minimap. Got it?

0816160004001482-ContentsGuide03-.name: What if there aren't any hungry monsters around?

0816160004001484-ContentsGuide03-.name: You can't find any hungry $itemPlural:61000002$? Maybe they're off foraging for food. Why don't you try beating up their slime friends? I bet they'll come running to help!

0816160004001485-ContentsGuide03-.name: Sometimes hungry $itemPlural:61000002$ will appear if you just wait here long enough. Of course, you can find them in other areas as well.

0821231304001543-ContentsGuide03-.name: Where else can I find them?

0821231304001544--.name: In addition to $map:63000056$, you can find $itemPlural:61000002$ at the habitats listed on the monster's Pet Album card.

0816160004001486-ContentsGuide03-.name: Good job! You'll need to keep practicing and get good at pet taming if you want to pass the test to join Team Mushroom.

0816160004001487-ContentsGuide03-.name: Is it your first time here? Have you captured pets before?

0816160004001489-ContentsGuide03-.name: Ah, then perhaps you're here to learn about leveling up your pets through fusion? If you have multiple pets, you can fuse one pet with another to increase the first pet's experience. Why don't you try leveling your $item:61000002$ through pet fusion?

0816160004001490-ContentsGuide03-.name: Do you have any questions I can answer?

0816160004001492-ContentsGuide03-.name: I don't have any pets I can fuse.

0816160004001493-ContentsGuide03-.name: To fuse your pets, navigate to the Character menu and open the Pets window. Then go to the Fusion tab.

0816160004001494-ContentsGuide03-.name: If you don't have enough pets to fuse, try capturing those hungry $itemPlural:61000002$ there.

0816160004001497-ContentsGuide03-.name: I've forgotten how to tame monsters...

0816160004001498-ContentsGuide03-.name: You can't find any hungry monsters? Then hunt the $itemPlural:61000002$ nearby until a hungry $item:61000002$ shows up to help its friends!

0816160004001499-ContentsGuide03-.name: Sometimes hungry $itemPlural:61000002$ will appear if you just wait here long enough. Of course, you can find them in other areas as well.

0821231304001546-ContentsGuide03-.name: Where else can I find them?

0821231304001547--.name: In addition to $map:63000056$, you can find $itemPlural:61000002$ at the habitats listed on the monster's Pet Album page.

0816160004001500-ContentsGuide03-.name: Throw the $itemPlural:63000000$ to a hungry monster to pacify it. Once the monster is fond of you, a heart will appear over its head, and it will follow you.

0816160004001503-ContentsGuide03-.name: Set up a trap, and lure the monster with the heart over its head into it! You can craft traps like the $item:63100000$ by opening the Life Skills window and navigating to Leisure > Pet Taming.

0816171104001506-ContentsGuide03-.name: Now, go and level up that $item:61000002$.

0816160004001505-ContentsGuide03-.name: Good. Keep helping your pet grow. A high level one will be much more useful to you.

0803231604001575-SurvivalTutorial-.name: Hm? The chest was empty? That's strange, I know I filled it... uh, last week? Nevermind, just take these. If you want something to test them on, we just got a huge shipment of $npcPlural:29000403$. Nobody'll miss one or two.

0804034804001579-SurvivalTutorial-.name: I don't feel much like chatting right now. Maybe I'll feel better after throwing some bombs around in $map:02000499$.

0805163104001591-SurvivalTutorial-.name: I lost those items you gave me...

0805155104001588-SurvivalTutorial-.name: Life as a mushroom isn't easy, you know...

0805154204001580-SurvivalTutorial-.name: There's a training area on the northwest side of $map:02000499$ where you can toss bombs around. Mushrooms can do it, and so can you.

0803231604001576-SurvivalTutorial-.name: You lost them? Well, that's all I had. So uhh, good luck.

0803231604001578-SurvivalTutorial-.name: Hehe! That looked fun. Wasn't that $npcName:29000403[gender:1]$ easy to defeat? If not, you're going to have a bad time in Mushtopia. Well, off you go then! Have fun!

0805171904001592-SurvivalTutorial-.name: Heheh! Welcome to $map:02000499$! There's a special gift for you in the chest behind me!

0805171904001597-SurvivalTutorial-.name: Huh? The chest was empty? Try asking a nearby staff member!

0806052304001598-SurvivalTutorial-.name: My shift's almost over, so I'm thinking of heading over to the training area to toss some bombs around.

0806052304001600-SurvivalTutorial-.name: You mean it sounds like fun! Toss 'em up and watch them go boom. Give it a try. I think you get some kind of prize the first time you do it. Just uh, maybe aim away from the tourists. We don't want another incident.

0806052304001601-SurvivalTutorial-.name: Just three hours, twenty-nine minutes and thirty-seven seconds until my shift ends...

0806052304001602-SurvivalTutorial-.name: Huh? A mysterious force told you you'd get a gift if you talked to me? That's weird. Well, wouldn't want to disappoint the universe. Um, here, take these.
